original: gzhan gyi gnod pa zhes pa ni ri dags la sogs pa'i nang du song yang ngo //
analyzed: gzhan gyi gnod pa zhes pa ni ri dags la sogs pa'i nang du song yang ngo //
translated: The harm of others is the harm of others, such as deer, etc.

original: gzhan gyis gnod pa ni gzhan rnams kyis te /üîΩde na rang bzhin gyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'di lta ste /
analyzed: gzhan gyis gnod pa ni gzhan rnams kyis te / de na rang bzhin gyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'di lta ste /
translated: The harm of others is the harm of others, such as deer, etc.

original: bcom ldan 'das ma des na las rgyal ba nyid de /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma des na las rgyal ba nyid de /
translated: There, by the afflictions of nature, it is said, this is the victory over karma.

original: de'i 'di ni rgyu mthun pa zhes pa dang dngos po zhes pas ni kun nas nyon mongs pa las rgyal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i 'di ni rgyu mthun pa zhes pa dang dngos po zhes pas ni kun nas nyon mongs pa las rgyal bar byed pa'o //
translated: By this is the natural outcome and this is the substance, it is the victory over affliction.

original: gal te zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gal te zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: If, etc.

original: de la ni lus la'o //
analyzed: de la ni lus la'o //
translated: There, in the body.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de la gang du mi 'phog ste /
analyzed: de la gang du mi 'phog ste /
translated: Where is it not pierced?

original: dus thams cad dang / yul thams cad du mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad las mthu thogs pa med pa'i phyir go rims bzhin du chen po dang / tshad med pa dang / gzhal du med pa'o //
analyzed: dus thams cad dang / yul thams cad du mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad las mthu thogs pa med pa'i phyir go rims bzhin du chen po dang / tshad med pa dang / gzhal du med pa'o //
translated: Because it is unobstructed in all times, in all places, and in all unfavorable conditions, it is great, immeasurable, and inconceivable, respectively.

original: de las lhag pa med pa'i phyir bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: de las lhag pa med pa'i phyir bla na med pa'o //
translated: It is unsurpassed because there is nothing higher than that.

original: mnyam pa med pas ni mi mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa med pas ni mi mnyam pa'o //
translated: It is unequalled because there is nothing equal to it.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o //üîΩrnam par gnod pa ni nye bar 'joms pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o // rnam par gnod pa ni nye bar 'joms pa ste /
translated: It is equal to the unequal, and equal to the equal.

original: de'i srog gi bar chad byed pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: de'i srog gi bar chad byed pa rnams kyis so //
translated: Harm is the destruction of the life of those who would harm him.

original: gzhan gyi nye bar 'ongs pas de glags rnyed par mi 'gyur zhes pa ni de rnams kyis brdzi ba med pa nyid de /
analyzed: gzhan gyi nye bar 'ongs pas de glags rnyed par mi 'gyur zhes pa ni de rnams kyis brdzi ba med pa nyid de /
translated: Others cannot harm him, because they cannot find an opportunity to do so.

original: 'di rnams ni las kyis nye bar gnod pas brdzi ba med pa'i byed pa'o //üîΩ'di la zhes pa la sogs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes des so //
analyzed: 'di rnams ni las kyis nye bar gnod pas brdzi ba med pa'i byed pa'o // 'di la zhes pa la sogs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes des so //
translated: These are the activities of being unassailable by the harm of karma.

original: rnam par gzigs @90b pa ni gdul bar bya ba yal bar mi 'dor ba nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par gzigs @90b pa ni gdul bar bya ba yal bar mi 'dor ba nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúHere‚Äù and so forth. By that gnosis of omniscience, he sees all those to be trained, and does not abandon them.

original: ci'i phyir zhes pa ni de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis gang du sngas rgyas kyi chos rnams thams cad la des ma thob pa gang yang cung zad yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhes pa ni de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis gang du sngas rgyas kyi chos rnams thams cad la des ma thob pa gang yang cung zad yod pa ma yin la /
translated: Why? In that way, by the gnosis of omniscience, there is nothing whatsoever that is not attained by him in all the vast dharmas.

original: thob par bya ba 'di thob par mi 'gyur na 'di thams cad mkhyen par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thob par bya ba 'di thob par mi 'gyur na 'di thams cad mkhyen par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If that which is to be attained were not attained, then he would not be omniscient.

original: des thob par bya ba dang / cig shos dag thams cad shes pa shes rab kyi mthar son nas mngon sum du byas pa'i ye shes la 'dir gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: des thob par bya ba dang / cig shos dag thams cad shes pa shes rab kyi mthar son nas mngon sum du byas pa'i ye shes la 'dir gzung bar bya ste /
translated: That which is to be attained by him, and the other, having become omniscient, having reached the culmination of wisdom, should be apprehended here as the knowledge that is manifested.

original: de'i phyir 'dir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dbye ba ni tha snyad kyi ldog pa'i dbye ba las dngos por yod pa ni ma yin zhes pa ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dbye ba ni tha snyad kyi ldog pa'i dbye ba las dngos por yod pa ni ma yin zhes pa ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi byed pa'o //
translated: Therefore, here that knowledge of omniscience is divided into the perfect enlightenment, which is a division of conventional designations, and is not existent as an entity. This is the function of perfect enlightenment.

original: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Moreover, etc.

original: chung ngu na zhes pa ni mchog tu phra ba'o //
analyzed: chung ngu na zhes pa ni mchog tu phra ba'o //
translated: Even the smallest means the most subtle.

original: ma rtogs pa ni phyi rol du byas pa ste /
analyzed: ma rtogs pa ni phyi rol du byas pa ste /
translated: Non-realization is externalized.

original: sngon gyi skye ba las phyis lan grangs kyis myong bar 'gyur bar nges pa'i mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa de rnam par smin pa'i lhag ma'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi skye ba las phyis lan grangs kyis myong bar 'gyur bar nges pa'i mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa de rnam par smin pa'i lhag ma'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: The remaining result of the maturation of nonvirtue that is certain to be experienced later in a subsequent life is the result of the maturation of the remainder.

original: 'di lta ste dper na zhes pa dpe ste snying po ni snying po ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste dper na zhes pa dpe ste snying po ni snying po ste /
translated: The example is like the essence of the earth.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i don gyi snying po ni byang chub pa'i snying po la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i don gyi snying po ni byang chub pa'i snying po la /
translated: The essence of the bodhisattva's purpose is the essence of enlightenment.

original: de la 'dug pa ni byang chub rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: de la 'dug pa ni byang chub rtogs pa ste /
translated: Sitting there is the realization of enlightenment.

original: de ltar yang rnam par gnas pa'i bskal pa'i thog ma la gser gyi rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi rnams kyi snying po khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi lte ba kun tu 'dus pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar yang rnam par gnas pa'i bskal pa'i thog ma la gser gyi rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi rnams kyi snying po khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi lte ba kun tu 'dus pa ste /
translated: Thus, in the first eon of the world, in the center of Jambudvipa, which is the most excellent essence of the golden earth, the gathering of all,

original: de yang rdo rje'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir dang / byang chub pa'i gdan yin pa'i phyir ni rdo rje'i gdan zhes brjod do //
analyzed: de yang rdo rje'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir dang / byang chub pa'i gdan yin pa'i phyir ni rdo rje'i gdan zhes brjod do //
translated: which is also called the vajra seat because it is of the nature of vajra and is the seat of enlightenment.

original: der byang chub kyi snying po la de thob pa'i khor yug tu gyur pa ni khor yug tu bskor ba'o //
analyzed: der byang chub kyi snying po la de thob pa'i khor yug tu gyur pa ni khor yug tu bskor ba'o //
translated: The surrounding area of the site of enlightenment is the surrounding area of the attainment of enlightenment.

original: yongs su khor yug ni yongs su bskor ba'o //
analyzed: yongs su khor yug ni yongs su bskor ba'o //
translated: The surrounding area is the surrounding area.

original: nang ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: nang ni dbus su'o //
translated: The inner part is the middle part.

original: byang chub pa'i shing ni byang chub pa'i shing ste /
analyzed: byang chub pa'i shing ni byang chub pa'i shing ste /
translated: The tree of enlightenment is the tree of enlightenment.

original: de'i drung na 'dug nas byang chub rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i drung na 'dug nas byang chub rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because one sits at its foot and realizes enlightenment.

original: de'i rtsa ba ste mngon par yongs su bcad pa'i sa phyogs so //üîΩrnam par 'tshe bar 'dod pa ni rnam par sdang bar 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rtsa ba ste mngon par yongs su bcad pa'i sa phyogs so // rnam par 'tshe bar 'dod pa ni rnam par sdang bar 'dod pa'o //
translated: Its root is the place of the cutting off of the root.üîΩThe desire to harm is the desire to hate.

original: gnod par 'dod pa ni bcom par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: gnod par 'dod pa ni bcom par 'dod pa'o //
translated: The desire to injure is the desire to destroy.

original: 'bebs par 'dod pa ni 'byung po dang sha za la sogs pa rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ'jigs pa la sogs pa'i gnyen po'i phyir 'jigs @91a * //
analyzed: 'bebs par 'dod pa ni 'byung po dang sha za la sogs pa rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir ro // 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i gnyen po'i phyir 'jigs @91a * //
translated: The desire to possess is the desire to possess spirits and rakshasas.

original: pa med pa'o //
analyzed: pa med pa'o //
translated: Fearlessness is the antidote to fear, etc.

original: kho na med pa dang / mi skrag pa ni byams pa chen po la sogs pa'i ming can gyi tshad med pas so //
analyzed: kho na med pa dang / mi skrag pa ni byams pa chen po la sogs pa'i ming can gyi tshad med pas so //
translated: The absence of fear and trembling is due to the immeasurables, which are called great love, etc.

original: rab tu sgom par mdzad pa ni rdzogs par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu sgom par mdzad pa ni rdzogs par mdzad pa'o //
translated: The phrase he cultivates means he perfects.

original: rab tu ston par mdzad pa ni bdud sde dang bcas pa rnams kyis bgegs byed kyang bzod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab tu ston par mdzad pa ni bdud sde dang bcas pa rnams kyis bgegs byed kyang bzod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase he teaches means he endures even when Mara and his hordes create obstacles.

original: mchod rten ni mchod pa'i rten la /
analyzed: mchod rten ni mchod pa'i rten la /
translated: The phrase a caitya means a support for worship.

original: der gyur pa ni de dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: der gyur pa ni de dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: The phrase he becomes like that means he becomes like a caitya.

original: bkur stir byed pa la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: bkur stir byed pa la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
translated: The phrases he honors, etc., have the same meaning as before.

original: nye bar phyin pa la skyob par byed pas skyob pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar phyin pa la skyob par byed pas skyob pa'o //
translated: The phrase he is a protector means he protects those who have come to him.

original: mngon sum du nye bar phyin pa'i 'jigs pa la bskyab pa'i phyir skyabs so //
analyzed: mngon sum du nye bar phyin pa'i 'jigs pa la bskyab pa'i phyir skyabs so //
translated: The phrase he is a refuge means he protects those who have come to him directly and are frightened.

original: 'jigs pa med pa der gnas par byed ces pas gnas so //
analyzed: 'jigs pa med pa der gnas par byed ces pas gnas so //
translated: The phrase he is a resort means he causes those who are frightened to remain there.

original: mchog tu dpung du gyur pas dpung gnyen la des pha rol du 'gro zhes pa ni rten mchod pa byed pa'o //
analyzed: mchog tu dpung du gyur pas dpung gnyen la des pha rol du 'gro zhes pa ni rten mchod pa byed pa'o //
translated: The phrase he is a final support means he goes to the other side by means of that final support.

original: 'jig rten pa'i bsgom pa'i lam zag pa dang bcas pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i bsgom pa'i lam zag pa dang bcas pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: The mundane path of cultivation is threefold:

original: mos pa yid la byed pa dang / bsngo ba yid la byed pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba yid la byed pa ste /
analyzed: mos pa yid la byed pa dang / bsngo ba yid la byed pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba yid la byed pa ste /
translated: Attention related to interest, attention related to dedication and attention related to rejoicing.

original: de ltar yang 'jig rten pas bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa la dmigs pa nyid kyis 'jig rten pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar yang 'jig rten pas bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa la dmigs pa nyid kyis 'jig rten pa ste /
translated: Thus, the mundane path is mundane because it focuses on the meditative stabilization and formless states of the mundane sphere.

original: zag pa dang bcas pa'i bsgom pa'i lam gyis mos pa dang / bsngo ba dang rjes su yi rang ba yid la byed pa la /
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa'i bsgom pa'i lam gyis mos pa dang / bsngo ba dang rjes su yi rang ba yid la byed pa la /
translated: The uncontaminated path is the attention related to interest, dedication and rejoicing in the contaminated path of cultivation.

original: zag pa med pa ni sgrub pa dang / shin tu dag pa zhes 'phags pa rnam par grol ba'i sdes bshad do //
analyzed: zag pa med pa ni sgrub pa dang / shin tu dag pa zhes 'phags pa rnam par grol ba'i sdes bshad do //
translated: The noble Vimuktasena explains that the uncontaminated path is the path of cultivation that is the means of accomplishment and complete purification.

original: gang du theg pa chen po'i mngon pa kun las btus pa las bshad de /
analyzed: gang du theg pa chen po'i mngon pa kun las btus pa las bshad de /
translated: The path of cultivation is explained in the Compendium of the Abhidharma of the Mahayana:

original: bsgom pa'i lam ni mthong ba'i lam las gong gi 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'jig rten pa'o //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i lam ni mthong ba'i lam las gong gi 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'jig rten pa'o //
translated: The path of cultivation is the supramundane and mundane path that is higher than the path of seeing.

original: 'jig rten pa'i lam gang zhe na ;
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i lam gang zhe na ;
translated: What is the mundane path?

original: 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa brgyad ces so //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa brgyad ces so //
translated: The mundane path is the eight mundane meditative stabilizations and formless states.

original: de la 'jig rten las 'das pa nyid kyi bsgom pa'i lam gang la gzhan gyi don du bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa la dmigs par byed pa de la ni 'jig rten pa zhes tha snyad du byed kyi /
analyzed: de la 'jig rten las 'das pa nyid kyi bsgom pa'i lam gang la gzhan gyi don du bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa la dmigs par byed pa de la ni 'jig rten pa zhes tha snyad du byed kyi /
translated: The supramundane path of meditation focuses on the first absorption and so on for the benefit of others, but it is called mundane vyavahara because it is similar to mundane states.üîΩIt is not mundane laukika in the sense of being contaminated and not subsumed by realization.

original: nye bar btags pa ma yin pa'i 'jig rten pa zag pa dang bcas pa rang nyid rtogs pa la ltos pa ni ma yin zhes pa'i don to //üîΩde la mos pa'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
analyzed: nye bar btags pa ma yin pa'i 'jig rten pa zag pa dang bcas pa rang nyid rtogs pa la ltos pa ni ma yin zhes pa'i don to // de la mos pa'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
translated: The treatise Attainment of Knowledge declares:

original: mos pa rnam gsum shes bya ste //
analyzed: mos pa rnam gsum shes bya ste //
translated: Interest should be known as threefold:

original: rang gi don dang rang gzhan don //
analyzed: rang gi don dang rang gzhan don //
translated: for one's own benefit, for both oneself and others,

original: gzhan gyi don te de dag ni //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don te de dag ni //
translated: and for the benefit of others.

original: so sor rnam pa gsum @91b du 'dod //
analyzed: so sor rnam pa gsum @91b du 'dod //
translated: Each of these is considered threefold:

original: chung dang 'bring dang chen po la //üîΩchung ngu'i chung sogs dbye ba yis //
analyzed: chung dang 'bring dang chen po la // chung ngu'i chung sogs dbye ba yis //
translated: small, medium and great.

original: de yang rnam gsum de lta bur //
analyzed: de yang rnam gsum de lta bur //
translated: Each of these is threefold:üîΩsmall-small and so on.

original: rnam pa nyi shu bdun du 'dod //
analyzed: rnam pa nyi shu bdun du 'dod //
translated: Thus interest is asserted to be twenty sevenfold.

original: ces te go rims bzhin du rang nyid dang / rang gzhan dag dang / gzhan nyid de /
analyzed: ces te go rims bzhin du rang nyid dang / rang gzhan dag dang / gzhan nyid de /
translated: Interest is asserted to be twenty sevenfold because it is threefold: for one's own benefit, for the benefit of both oneself and others and for the benefit of others.

original: don gtso bor sems pa gang gis de ltar te /
analyzed: don gtso bor sems pa gang gis de ltar te /
translated: Those who think of the meaning primarily should do so in this way.

original: 'di dag ni rang gi don la sogs pa'i yang chung ngu la sogs pa rnams la so sor chung ngu la sogs par bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rang gi don la sogs pa'i yang chung ngu la sogs pa rnams la so sor chung ngu la sogs par bya ba ste /
translated: These are the small, medium, and great forms of interest in one's own and others' goals and so on.

original: ji ltar rang gi don gyi mos pa'i chung ngu'i chung ngu dang / chung ngu'i 'bring dang / chung ngu'i chen po dang / 'bring gi chung ngu dang / 'bring gi 'bring dang / 'bring gi chen po dang / chen po'i chung ngu dang / chen po'i 'bring dang /
analyzed: ji ltar rang gi don gyi mos pa'i chung ngu'i chung ngu dang / chung ngu'i 'bring dang / chung ngu'i chen po dang / 'bring gi chung ngu dang / 'bring gi 'bring dang / 'bring gi chen po dang / chen po'i chung ngu dang / chen po'i 'bring dang /
translated: The small of the small, the small of the medium, the small of the great, the medium of the small, the medium of the medium, the medium of the great, the great of the small, the great of the medium,

original: chen po'i chen po ste /
analyzed: chen po'i chen po ste /
translated: and the great of the great.

original: dgu ni drod la'o //
analyzed: dgu ni drod la'o //
translated: These nine are the nine degrees of warmth.

original: de bzhin du rang gzhan don gyi dgu ni rtse mo la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rang gzhan don gyi dgu ni rtse mo la'o //
translated: Similarly, the nine degrees of interest in one's own and others' goals are the nine degrees of the peak.

original: gzhan gyi don gyi dgu ni bzod pa'i zhes pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don gyi dgu ni bzod pa'i zhes pa ste /
translated: The nine degrees of interest in others' goals are the nine degrees of patient acceptance.

original: mos pa dang / dad pa dang / 'dun pa dang / yid ches pa dang / mngon par 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid rnams kyis so //
analyzed: mos pa dang / dad pa dang / 'dun pa dang / yid ches pa dang / mngon par 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid rnams kyis so //
translated: They are characterized by interest, faith, keenness, confidence and desire.

original: gang la mos na mdo dang mdo'i don gyi ngo bo bcom ldan 'das ma las te /
analyzed: gang la mos na mdo dang mdo'i don gyi ngo bo bcom ldan 'das ma las te /
translated: If one wonders what one should be devoted to, it is the Sutra and the meaning of the Sutra, the nature of the Bhagavatƒ´.

original: de la dang po ni de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / brgya byin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de la dang po ni de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / brgya byin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: There, the first is ‚ÄúWhen this was said, ≈öatakratu, Lord of the Gods, etc.‚Äù

original: bris pa ni rang nyid kyis la /
analyzed: bris pa ni rang nyid kyis la /
translated: ‚ÄúWritten‚Äù is by oneself;

original: glegs bam du chud par byas pa ni gzhan gyis so //
analyzed: glegs bam du chud par byas pa ni gzhan gyis so //
translated: ‚Äúmade into a book‚Äù is by others.

original: lha'i zhes pa ni khyad par du 'phags pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: lha'i zhes pa ni khyad par du 'phags pa rnams kyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúDivine‚Äù is by the exalted ones.

original: me tog ni sil ma'o //
analyzed: me tog ni sil ma'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFlowers‚Äù are loose flowers.

original: phreng ba ni brgyus pa las byung ba'o //
analyzed: phreng ba ni brgyus pa las byung ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúGarlands‚Äù are made from strings.

original: byug pa ni mnyam du sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: byug pa ni mnyam du sbyor ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúPerfume‚Äù is a mixture.

original: phye ma ni gzhan aa ka ru dang / tsandan la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: phye ma ni gzhan aa ka ru dang / tsandan la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúPowder‚Äù is made from other things, such as aloeswood and sandalwood.

original: chos gos ni gos la /
analyzed: chos gos ni gos la /
translated: ‚ÄúReligious robes‚Äù are garments.

original: mchod pa rnams kyis ni zhal zas la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: mchod pa rnams kyis ni zhal zas la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúWorship‚Äù is with food offerings, etc.üîΩ‚ÄúMany kinds‚Äù are the offerings of food, drink, incense, etc.

original: rnam pa mang po rnams kyis ni bza' bca' dang / bdug pa la sogs pa'i bye brag gi mchod pa rnams kyis ni bkur sti byed pa dang 'brel te /
analyzed: rnam pa mang po rnams kyis ni bza' bca' dang / bdug pa la sogs pa'i bye brag gi mchod pa rnams kyis ni bkur sti byed pa dang 'brel te /
translated: ‚ÄúWith‚Äù is connected to ‚Äúhonor.‚Äù

original: mchod pa byed ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: mchod pa byed ces pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is ‚Äúmake offerings.‚Äù

original: bla mar byed pa ni gus pas so //
analyzed: bla mar byed pa ni gus pas so //
translated: One should revere them with devotion.

original: rim gror byed pa ni dad par byed pa la /üîΩmchod par byed pa ni phyag dang thal mo sbyar ba dang bstod pa la sogs pa rnams kyis so //

analyzed: sku gdung ni gdung ste mchod rten rnams su gzhag par byed pa'o // yongs su 'dzin par byed pa @92a * //

analyzed: mngon par rdzogs pa'i don gsungs pa ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes pa 'di'i yang don gsungs pa ni so sor thob ces pa'o //

analyzed: kha ton byed par 'gyur zhes pa ni kha ton shin tu goms par ro //

analyzed: phan yon chen po ni mos par spyod pa la'o //

translated: The result of that very practice which causes the mind to become extremely clear.üîΩThe enlightenment of the solitary sage is the enlightenment of the solitary sage.

analyzed: ngan pa'i las la zhen pa ni le lo la ;

original: sems pa ni bstan pa'o //
analyzed: sems pa ni bstan pa'o //

original: sems ni ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: sems ni ting nge 'dzin to //

original: 'du shes pa ni dran pa la mos pa ni dad pa'o //

analyzed: 'dir gzhug par bya ba ni de dag gi 'thad pa dang bcas pa'i shes pas na nang du spyod pa lhag ma la bsod nams lhag par shes par bya zhes pa ni chung ngu'i chen po'o //
translated: Here, should be engaged means by the understanding that is accompanied by logical reasoning. One should understand that the remaining inner conduct has superior merit. This is the great of the small.

original: de lta bas na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de lta bas na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Therefore, etc.

original: gser dang / dngul dang / bee d'urya dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / karke ta na ste rin po che sna bdun no //
analyzed: gser dang / dngul dang / bee d'urya dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / karke ta na ste rin po che sna bdun no //

original: de'i gzhi ni de'i rgyus so //
analyzed: de'i gzhi ni de'i rgyus so //

original: bcom ldan 'das ma la dad pa dang mos pa dang dang ba rnams skyed pa la lhag pa'i bsam pa dang nyan pa la sogs pa dang don rnam par 'byed pa dang yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang dpyod pas tshul kun tu gzhag pa'i dpyod pa blaüîΩlhag pa la bsod nams bla lhag pa ni gzhung ji lta ba bzhin no zhes pa ni 'bring gi chung ngu'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma la dad pa dang mos pa dang dang ba rnams skyed pa la lhag pa'i bsam pa dang nyan pa la sogs pa dang don rnam par 'byed pa dang yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang dpyod pas tshul kun tu gzhag pa'i dpyod pa bla lhag pa la bsod nams bla lhag pa ni gzhung ji lta ba bzhin no zhes pa ni 'bring gi chung ngu'o //
translated: The analysis of the establishment of the method is the analysis of the establishment of the method by means of superior intention, listening, etc., and by means of the discrimination of meaning, mental reflection, and investigation, in order to generate faith, devotion, and clarity in the Bhagavatƒ´.üîΩThe superior merit is as stated in the text. This is the medium of the small.

original: zhog ces pa la sogs pa ste /

analyzed: de la gang dang gang du bshad pa'i phan yon la dad pa la sogs pas spyod pa dang bla lhag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni 'bring gi 'bring ngo //
translated: The practice of faith, etc., in the benefit that is taught here and there is called with superior practice. This is the medium of the medium.

original: zhog ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhog ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: and so on.

original: gling chen po bzhi pa 'dir zhes pa ni /
analyzed: gling chen po bzhi pa 'dir zhes pa ni /

analyzed: gling chen po bzhi las 'jig rten 'dzin pa byed pas khams zhes pa ni rang gi don gyi mos pa 'bring gi chen po'o //

original: zhog ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhog ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: and so on.

original: gling bzhi pa rnams kyis yongs su @93a * //üîΩbsgres pa stong zhes pa ste /
analyzed: gling bzhi pa rnams kyis yongs su @93a * // bsgres pa stong zhes pa ste /
translated: The thousand times four continentsüîΩis called a small chiliocosm.

original: zhog ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhog ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: and so on.

analyzed: 'di stong gnyis su yongs su sgyur ba zhes pa ni stong gnyis pa'i stong gi stong zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The thousand times the small chiliocosm is called a dichiliocosm.

analyzed: de ni bar ma'i stong ste stong dang stong chen po'i bar gyi phyir ro zhes pa ni rang gi don gyi mos pa chen po'i 'bring ngo //

original: zhog ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhog ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: and so on.

analyzed: 'di lta bu'i stong gnyis pa rnams kyis yongs su bsgres pa'i stong gsum mo zhes pa'i don to //

analyzed: de ltar de bzhin du stong chen po zhes pa ni rang gi don gyi mos pa chen po'i chen po'o //

original: zhog ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhog ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Place and so on.

original: yongs su brtags pa ni yongs su brtags pas so //
analyzed: yongs su brtags pa ni yongs su brtags pas so //

analyzed: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ni mchod rten la mchod pa thams cad kyis 'dir bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag pas ni bcom ldan 'das ma la mchod pa'i bsod nams kyi las bla lhag par nye bar bskyed pa'i shes pas spyod pa dang bla lhag ces pa ni
translated: For as long as one lives means for as long as one lives. Here means in this life. For an eon or more than an eon means for an eon or more than an eon. By all the offerings to a stupa means by all the offerings to a stupa. One should generate the karma of merit for offering to the Bhagavatƒ´ means one should generate the karma of merit for offering to the Bhagavatƒ´. Superior means superior.

original: rang gzhan don gyi mos pa chung ngu'i chung ngu'o //
analyzed: rang gzhan don gyi mos pa chung ngu'i chung ngu'o //
translated: Interest in the aim of self and other is the small of the small.

original: zhog ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhog ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Place and so on.üîΩHere means in this life. For an eon or more than an eon means for an eon or more than an eon. By all the offerings to a stupa means by all the offerings to a stupa. One should generate the karma of merit for offering to the Bhagavatƒ´ means one should generate the karma of merit for offering to the Bhagavatƒ´. Superior means superior.üîΩInterest in the aim of self and other is the small of the small.

original: 'di 'dra ba nyid ces bsam pa las 'das pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
analyzed: 'di 'dra ba nyid ces bsam pa las 'das pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
translated: Since it is beyond thought, it is inconceivable.

original: 'dra ba med pas mi mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: 'dra ba med pas mi mnyam pa'o //
translated: Since it is not similar, it is unequal.

original: bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa'i bsod nams kyi las la cha ni cha shas so //üîΩmi phod ces pa ni mi rung mi thob ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa'i bsod nams kyi las la cha ni cha shas so // mi phod ces pa ni mi rung mi thob ces pa'i don to //
translated: A part of the merit that is created is a part of the meritorious action.

original: char yang mi phod ces pa ni /üîΩbsnyams na zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: char yang mi phod ces pa ni / bsnyams na zhes pa'i don to //
translated: It is not even a fraction means it is not suitable, it is not obtained.üîΩIt is not even a fraction meansüîΩit is not equal.

original: ci ltar bgrangs kyang grangs bla lhag pas mi mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: ci ltar bgrangs kyang grangs bla lhag pas mi mnyam pa ste /
translated: However many are counted, it is unequal because it is superior.

original: sngon gyi bsod nams kyis ji srid du bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis kyang phyi ma'i bsod nams dang bsnyams na mi bzod la /
analyzed: sngon gyi bsod nams kyis ji srid du bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis kyang phyi ma'i bsod nams dang bsnyams na mi bzod la /
translated: Even by a hundred thousand times a trillion of the former merit, the latter merit is not equal.

original: yang dus phra mor gyur pas grangs su bgrangs pas da ltar byung ba la sogs pa de rnams kyis ji ltar yang mi phod pa'o //
analyzed: yang dus phra mor gyur pas grangs su bgrangs pas da ltar byung ba la sogs pa de rnams kyis ji ltar yang mi phod pa'o //
translated: Since it is a very small time, it is counted as a fraction. The present and so on are in no way equal to it.

original: de las bla lhag pas ni mi mnyam pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las bla lhag pas ni mi mnyam pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since it is superior, it is unequal.

original: sngon gyi bsod nams kyis ji srid du phye ba'i 'gyur gyis kyang phyi ma'i bsod nams la bsdur yang mi bzod pa'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi bsod nams kyis ji srid du phye ba'i 'gyur gyis kyang phyi ma'i bsod nams la bsdur yang mi bzod pa'o //
translated: Even if one were to compare the merit of the past with the merit of the future, it would not bear comparison.

original: tha mi dad pa'i dpe med pas zla med pa'o //üîΩgrangs kyi dpe med pas dpe med pa'o //
analyzed: tha mi dad pa'i dpe med pas zla med pa'o // grangs kyi dpe med pas dpe med pa'o //
translated: It is incomparable because there is no example of anything that is not different.üîΩIt is without example because there is no example of a number.

original: bgrang ba'i dpe'i rgyu med @93b pas rgyur med pa ste /
analyzed: bgrang ba'i dpe'i rgyu med @93b pas rgyur med pa ste /
translated: It is without cause because there is no cause for counting.

original: de la 'dis bsdur bar mi bzod pa'o //
analyzed: de la 'dis bsdur bar mi bzod pa'o //
translated: It is not to be compared with that.

original: dpe dang rgyur yang zhes pa ni de ltar shin tu yang mnyam pa med pas rgyur yang zhes pa ste /
analyzed: dpe dang rgyur yang zhes pa ni de ltar shin tu yang mnyam pa med pas rgyur yang zhes pa ste /
translated: As for ‚Äúeven as an example or cause,‚Äù it is like that, utterly without equal, even as a cause.

original: mnyam pa'i don gyi gang zhig dpe'i rgyu dang nye bar 'dug nas drung na gnas pa de yang rigs pa ma yin zhes pa'i don la /
analyzed: mnyam pa'i don gyi gang zhig dpe'i rgyu dang nye bar 'dug nas drung na gnas pa de yang rigs pa ma yin zhes pa'i don la /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúequal‚Äù is that which is present as an example or cause, and even that which is present nearby is not reasonable.

original: kye ma zhes pa ni bod pa ste /
analyzed: kye ma zhes pa ni bod pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúAlas!‚Äù is an expression of surprise.

original: 'phags pa zhes pa'i don to //üîΩkun tu rgyu ba zhes pa ni bsam pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa zhes pa'i don to // kun tu rgyu ba zhes pa ni bsam pa'o //
translated: It means ‚Äúnoble one.‚ÄùüîΩ‚ÄúWandering‚Äù is the intention.

original: brtags pa ni dran bas so //
analyzed: brtags pa ni dran bas so //
translated: ‚ÄúImagined‚Äù is by memory.

original: kha don du ni yid kyis bzlas pa byas pa 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa gsum du rnam par bshad de /
analyzed: kha don du ni yid kyis bzlas pa byas pa 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa gsum du rnam par bshad de /
translated: The three lines beginning ‚ÄúThis mantra is unsurpassed‚Äù are recited mentally in the oral recitation.

original: 'dir 'di las lhag pa'i rig sngags med pas gong na med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir 'di las lhag pa'i rig sngags med pas gong na med pa'o //
translated: Here, it is unsurpassed because there is no mantra superior to this one.

original: 'dir 'di las lhag pa'i dge ba'i chos med pas bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir 'di las lhag pa'i dge ba'i chos med pas bla na med pa'o //
translated: Here, it is unexcelled because there is no virtuous phenomenon superior to this.

original: mnyam pa'i rig sngags gzhan med pas mi mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa'i rig sngags gzhan med pas mi mnyam pa'o //
translated: It is unequalled because there is no other mantra equal to this.

original: mi mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang mnyam pa'i phyir mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: mi mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang mnyam pa'i phyir mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o //
translated: It is equal to the unequalled because it is equal to the unequaled tathagatas.

original: rab tu phye bar bgyi zhing rab tu gsal bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: rab tu phye bar bgyi zhing rab tu gsal bar bgyi'o //
translated: I will reveal and illuminate it.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang ldan pa ni de'i rten yin pa'i phyir na de rnams kyis yongs su bzung nas gnas pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang ldan pa ni de'i rten yin pa'i phyir na de rnams kyis yongs su bzung nas gnas pa'o //
translated: Since the seven factors of enlightenment are its basis, it is supported by them.

original: brgyad khri bzhi stong zhes pa ni chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams te /
analyzed: brgyad khri bzhi stong zhes pa ni chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams te /
translated: The 84,000 refers to the 84,000 aggregates of Dharma.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa la spyod pa rnams kyi re re'i spyod pa'i gnyen por ji srid du gzhung gis yongs su rdzogs pa de srid ni chos kyi phung po ste /
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa la spyod pa rnams kyi re re'i spyod pa'i gnyen por ji srid du gzhung gis yongs su rdzogs pa de srid ni chos kyi phung po ste /
translated: For each of the practices of desire and so on, there is a remedy, and as long as the treatise is complete, so long is the Dharma aggregate.

original: chos kyi phung po gcig go //
analyzed: chos kyi phung po gcig go //
translated: This is one Dharma aggregate.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes ni rang gis byung bas rang byung ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes ni rang gis byung bas rang byung ba'o //
translated: The wisdom of the Buddhas is self-arisen because it arises by itself.

original: bsam pa las shin tu 'das pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
analyzed: bsam pa las shin tu 'das pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
translated: It is inconceivable because it transcends thought.

original: sngon du thos nas zhes pa ni sngon du thos pa las byung bas so //
analyzed: sngon du thos nas zhes pa ni sngon du thos pa las byung bas so //
translated: Having heard it before means that it arises from what was heard before.

original: sman dang skar ma ni sman dang skar ma yang gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sman dang skar ma ni sman dang skar ma yang gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: The medicine and the stars are also illuminated by the medicine and the stars.

original: chos ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
analyzed: chos ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
translated: The Dharma is nirvana,

original: chos thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is superior to all dharmas.

original: de nyid kyi mnyam pa ni nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi mnyam pa ni nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Its equality is because it pacifies the suffering of affliction.

original: de'i spyod pa ni dge ba legs par spyod pa'o //
analyzed: de'i spyod pa ni dge ba legs par spyod pa'o //
translated: Its practice is the good practice of virtue.

original: yang ba ni 'chi ba'i rgyu la /
analyzed: yang ba ni 'chi ba'i rgyu la /
translated: Lightness is the cause of death.

original: de ma spangs pa ni yang ba ma spangs pa'o //
analyzed: de ma spangs pa ni yang ba ma spangs pa'o //
translated: Not abandoning it is not abandoning the light.

original: 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa ni lhag ma ste /
analyzed: 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa ni lhag ma ste /
translated: The detailed explanation of this is the remainder.

original: chad pas zhes pa ni ldog pa la sogs pas so //
analyzed: chad pas zhes pa ni ldog pa la sogs pas so //
translated: By cutting off, etc. is by way of turning away, etc.

original: brjod pa ni 'ongs pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: brjod pa ni 'ongs pa'i tshig go //
translated: Expression is the word that has come.

original: mngon par brjod pa ni gtam gyi rgyun la /
analyzed: mngon par brjod pa ni gtam gyi rgyun la /
translated: Manifestation is the continuity of speech.

original: so sor dga' mgu ba ni gos la sogs pa nye bar stobs pas so //üîΩbyams @94a * //
analyzed: so sor dga' mgu ba ni gos la sogs pa nye bar stobs pas so // byams @94a * //
translated: Individual satisfaction is by the bestowal of clothing, etc.

original: pa'i sems kyis dang phan pa'i sems kyis te /
analyzed: pa'i sems kyis dang phan pa'i sems kyis te /
translated: With a mind of love and a mind of benefit.

original: sgyu ma la sogs pa ni ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma la sogs pa ni ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is not with deceit, etc.

original: snying rje ni 'bras bu la ste /
analyzed: snying rje ni 'bras bu la ste /
translated: Compassion is for the result.

original: 'dir snying rje ba des so sor gdod nas sdug bsngal bsal bar sems pas so //
analyzed: 'dir snying rje ba des so sor gdod nas sdug bsngal bsal bar sems pas so //
translated: Here, by that compassion, one thinks to remove the individual's suffering from the beginning.

original: gdug pa ni ri dags gtum po'o //
analyzed: gdug pa ni ri dags gtum po'o //
translated: Wild animals are fierce animals.

original: sdig sbrul ni sbrul lo //
analyzed: sdig sbrul ni sbrul lo //
translated: Poisonous snakes are snakes.

original: ma gtogs zhes pa ni 'jug pa las phyi rol du byas pa'o //üîΩkun tu brtags pa ni yid la byas nas so //
analyzed: ma gtogs zhes pa ni 'jug pa las phyi rol du byas pa'o // kun tu brtags pa ni yid la byas nas so //
translated: Excluded is being left out of the engagement.üîΩImagined is by mental attention.

original: klan ka tshol ba'i bsam pa ni sdang ba dang bcas pa'i sems kyis so //
analyzed: klan ka tshol ba'i bsam pa ni sdang ba dang bcas pa'i sems kyis so //
translated: The thought of seeking fault is with a mind that is hostile.

original: mig gis mi rtsol ba ni yid kyis so //
analyzed: mig gis mi rtsol ba ni yid kyis so //
translated: The eyes do not strive, but the mind does.

original: dpung gi tshogs ni dpung gi tshogs la /
analyzed: dpung gi tshogs ni dpung gi tshogs la /
translated: The army is for the army.

original: de ni yan lag bzhi ste /
analyzed: de ni yan lag bzhi ste /
translated: It has four branches,

original: glang po dang / rta dang / bdag po'i shing rta dang / bkod pa 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: glang po dang / rta dang / bdag po'i shing rta dang / bkod pa 'dus pa'o //
translated: the elephant, horse, chariot, and infantry.

original: slar log pa ni ma zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: slar log pa ni ma zhugs pa'o //
translated: The return is the non-entry.

original: bar snang zhes pa ni nam mkha' nas nam mkhar son pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: bar snang zhes pa ni nam mkha' nas nam mkhar son pa rnams kyis so //
translated: The sky is the space that is reached from the sky.

original: yun ring mo ni yun ring po nas so //
analyzed: yun ring mo ni yun ring po nas so //
translated: For a long time is for a long time.

original: ched du brjod pa ni yang yang brjod pa'o //
analyzed: ched du brjod pa ni yang yang brjod pa'o //
translated: The exclamation is the repeated expression.

original: ngan don ni nyung ngu'o //
analyzed: ngan don ni nyung ngu'o //
translated: The little meaning is the small.

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni de ltar dngos po med pa nyid la'o //
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni de ltar dngos po med pa nyid la'o //
translated: Just as in the perfection of wisdom, so in the non-entityness.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho chen po zhes pa ni chung ngu'i 'bring ngo //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho chen po zhes pa ni chung ngu'i 'bring ngo //
translated: The perfection of wisdom itself is the great ocean, which is the medium of the small.

original: de nas yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nas yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Then again, etc.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis 'dren pa po nyid la sogs pa shes par 'thad pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa bla lhag pa las bsod nams bla lhag par shes par byed pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis 'dren pa po nyid la sogs pa shes par 'thad pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa bla lhag pa las bsod nams bla lhag par shes par byed pa'o //
translated: The merit of the conduct with reason, which is the leadership by the six perfections, etc., is to be understood as superior.

original: bsngags pa ni bstod pa'am yon tan no //
analyzed: bsngags pa ni bstod pa'am yon tan no //
translated: Praise is eulogy or virtue.

original: sngon du 'gro ba ni mdun du 'gro ba'o //üîΩ'dren pa ni sdud pa po la /
analyzed: sngon du 'gro ba ni mdun du 'gro ba'o // 'dren pa ni sdud pa po la /
translated: The forerunner is the one who goes in front.üîΩThe leader is the one who gathers.

original: yongs su 'dren pa ni kun tu 'phel bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su 'dren pa ni kun tu 'phel bar byed pa'o //
translated: The guide is the one who causes to increase.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang nyid kyis mchog yin pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang nyid kyis mchog yin pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the perfection because it is itself supreme.

original: cig shos te de rnams nyid kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed kyis so zhes pa ni chung ngu'i chen po'o //
analyzed: cig shos te de rnams nyid kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed kyis so zhes pa ni chung ngu'i chen po'o //
translated: The others, because they are dedicated to omniscience by it, are perfections. This is the great of the small.

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Then, etc.

original: glegs bam du chud pa ni dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas pa'i phyir mchod pa'i phan yon zhes pas 'dir spyod pa bla lhag pa zhes pa ni 'bring dang chung ngu'o //
analyzed: glegs bam du chud pa ni dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas pa'i phyir mchod pa'i phan yon zhes pas 'dir spyod pa bla lhag pa zhes pa ni 'bring dang chung ngu'o //
translated: The one that is written down is the superior practice, because it is for the sake of the long-lasting of the holy Dharma. The benefit of worship is as follows: Here, the superior practice is the middling and lesser.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa zhes pa la sogs pa ni spyod pa bla lhag pa ste /
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa zhes pa la sogs pa ni spyod pa bla lhag pa ste /
translated: The one that is said to be thus spoken and so forth is the superior practice.

original: mdo ji lta ba bzhin te 'bring gi 'bring ngo //
analyzed: mdo ji lta ba bzhin te 'bring gi 'bring ngo //
translated: It is according to the sutra, the middling of the middling.

original: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Moreover, and so forth and so on.

original: snag gi gnyen mtshams ni mngal gcig nas skyes pa'o //
analyzed: snag gi gnyen mtshams ni mngal gcig nas skyes pa'o //
translated: The blood relatives are those born from the same womb.

original: phan tshun rjes su sbyor ba @94b ni 'dri ba ste /
analyzed: phan tshun rjes su sbyor ba @94b ni 'dri ba ste /
translated: The mutual application is the question.

original: 'bring gi chen po'o //
analyzed: 'bring gi chen po'o //
translated: It is the middling of the great.

original: gang su zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang su zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The one that is said to be whoever and so forth.

original: lha thams cad nye bar 'ongs pa ni dang pas so //
analyzed: lha thams cad nye bar 'ongs pa ni dang pas so //
translated: The coming of all the gods is the first.

original: de rnams la chos kyi dbyings kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa'i spyod pa bla lhag pa zhes pa ni chen po'i chung ngu'o //
analyzed: de rnams la chos kyi dbyings kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa'i spyod pa bla lhag pa zhes pa ni chen po'i chung ngu'o //
translated: The giving of the gift of the Dharma realm to them is the superior practice. Superior is the lesser of the great.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The one that is said to be thus spoken and so forth.

original: lha la sogs pa gang zhig 'ongs nas mchod pa shes par rab tu gzengs bstod par 'gyur zhes dad pa'i mthu la dad pa bla lhag pa dang spyod pa bla lhag pa'o //
analyzed: lha la sogs pa gang zhig 'ongs nas mchod pa shes par rab tu gzengs bstod par 'gyur zhes dad pa'i mthu la dad pa bla lhag pa dang spyod pa bla lhag pa'o //
translated: One should have faith in the power of faith, and in the power of conduct, in order to be greatly encouraged by the thought that gods and so on will come and praise one when one knows that one is being worshipped.

original: kun tu shes te ni kun tu mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: kun tu shes te ni kun tu mtshon pa'o //
translated: One should know means one should understand.

original: mthar thug pa ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: mthar thug pa ni nges pa'o //
translated: The ultimate is the certain.

original: 'gro bar bya ba ni bya ba la'o //
analyzed: 'gro bar bya ba ni bya ba la'o //
translated: The to be gone is the action.

original: mi ma yin pa'i dri zhes pa ni mi'i lus ni mi la /
analyzed: mi ma yin pa'i dri zhes pa ni mi'i lus ni mi la /
translated: The non-human smell is the human body.

original: de lta ma yin pa ni mi ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta ma yin pa ni mi ma yin no //
translated: The non-human is not human.

original: mi gtsang ba med pa ni gtsang sbra la me tog la sogs pa dang ldan pas gtsang ma'o //
analyzed: mi gtsang ba med pa ni gtsang sbra la me tog la sogs pa dang ldan pas gtsang ma'o //
translated: The pure is the clean one who has flowers and so on.

original: byol ba ni 'phos nas so //
analyzed: byol ba ni 'phos nas so //
translated: The gone away is the gone-over.

original: ngal ba ni gnod pa'o //
analyzed: ngal ba ni gnod pa'o //
translated: The weariness is the harm.

original: rgya chen po ni chen po la /
analyzed: rgya chen po ni chen po la /
translated: The great is the great.

original: so sor myong bar 'gyur ba ni rtogs par 'gyur bas so //
analyzed: so sor myong bar 'gyur ba ni rtogs par 'gyur bas so //
translated: The experienced is the understood.

original: brkam pa ni 'dod pa la /
analyzed: brkam pa ni 'dod pa la /
translated: The greedy is the desirous.

original: 'du shes ni dran pa'i zhes pa ni chen po'i 'bring ngo //
analyzed: 'du shes ni dran pa'i zhes pa ni chen po'i 'bring ngo //
translated: The perception is the great middle.

original: koo shi ka gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa nas le'u yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar ni chen po'i chen po'o //
analyzed: koo shi ka gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa nas le'u yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar ni chen po'i chen po'o //
translated: The section from Kausika, moreover up to the end of the chapter is the great-great.

original: gzhal du med pa'i yon tan ni glegs bam gang gis bcangs nas gzung ba la sogs pas 'dzin pa ni de skad ces brjod pa /
analyzed: gzhal du med pa'i yon tan ni glegs bam gang gis bcangs nas gzung ba la sogs pas 'dzin pa ni de skad ces brjod pa /
translated: The incalculable qualities are those which are held by any book which is held by means of recitation, etc. That is what is said.

original: de yang pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mchod rten zhes pa gnyis te /
analyzed: de yang pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mchod rten zhes pa gnyis te /
translated: Moreover, there are two: the perfections and the relic.

original: de dag la bsnyen bkur ni me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa ste /
analyzed: de dag la bsnyen bkur ni me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa ste /
translated: Worship of those is the worship with flowers, etc. That is what is said.

original: de brjod pa can gyi le'u'o //
analyzed: de brjod pa can gyi le'u'o //
translated: That is the chapter which describes it.

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i 'grel ba gnad kyi zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba /üîΩpandi ta 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa las le'u gsum pa'o /
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i 'grel ba gnad kyi zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba / pandi ta 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa las le'u gsum pa'o /
translated: The commentary on the Perfection of Wisdom in Eight Thousand Lines called Light on the Meaning SupremeüîΩThe third chapter

original: // / gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: // / gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Moreover, etc.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang chos kyi sku nyid ro gcig pa'i phyir na shin tu mchod par bya'i /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang chos kyi sku nyid ro gcig pa'i phyir na shin tu mchod par bya'i /
translated: Since the perfection of wisdom itself and the Dharma body itself are of one taste, it is to be worshipped very much.

original: gzugs kyi sku la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzugs kyi sku la ni ma yin te /
translated: But not in the form body, because that is a perishable collection.

original: 'jig tshogs yin pa'i phyir zhes pa 'di'i don la gang zhig dad pa dang dang pa'i stobs la brten nas kyang tshod bla lhag pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig tshogs yin pa'i phyir zhes pa 'di'i don la gang zhig dad pa dang dang pa'i stobs la brten nas kyang tshod bla lhag pa ste /
translated: The meaning of this is that one who, on the basis of the power of faith and devotion, has a superior portion of the wisdom of hearing and reflection,

original: de ni 'dir spyod pa bla lhag pa'o //
analyzed: de ni 'dir spyod pa bla lhag pa'o //
translated: that is the superior practice here.

original: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku ni gdung ste /
analyzed: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku ni gdung ste /
translated: That is the body of the Tathagatas, the relics.

original: de rnams kyis bkang nas 'dam par byed pa ni gcig khyer cig ces rjod par byed na'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyis bkang nas 'dam par byed pa ni gcig khyer cig ces rjod par byed na'o //
translated: Having filled them, one should make an image of the Tathagata, and say, ‚ÄúTake one.‚Äù

original: ri mor bgyi ba ni shin tu yang gus pa ste /üîΩde dag las bla mar gyur pa ni bcom @95a * //
analyzed: ri mor bgyi ba ni shin tu yang gus pa ste / de dag las bla mar gyur pa ni bcom @95a * //
translated: One should make an image with great respect.

original: ldan 'das ma'o //
analyzed: ldan 'das ma'o //
translated: Among those, the most superior is the Bhagavati.

original: 'di ni zhes pa ni bris pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes pa ni bris pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la'o //
translated: This, the written perfection of wisdom method,

original: yang dag pa ni 'dir de kho na nyid de chos rnams thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa nyid la /
analyzed: yang dag pa ni 'dir de kho na nyid de chos rnams thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa nyid la /
translated: is the reality here, the essencelessness of all phenomena.

original: don du gnyer bar bya bas don te /
analyzed: don du gnyer bar bya bas don te /
translated: It is the goal because it is to be pursued.

original: yang dag pa'i don to //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i don to //
translated: It is the true goal.

original: don dam pa ni chos kyi sku la /
analyzed: don dam pa ni chos kyi sku la /
translated: The ultimate is the Dharma body.

original: de'i rjod par byed pa des de ltar sbyor nas don du gnyer ba po la gtso bo'i sku mngon par brjod pas nye bar btags pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku'o //
analyzed: de'i rjod par byed pa des de ltar sbyor nas don du gnyer ba po la gtso bo'i sku mngon par brjod pas nye bar btags pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku'o //
translated: The one who expresses that, having applied it in that way, to the one who is striving, the body of the principal one, is the body of the Tathagatas, which is designated by the expression of the body of the principal one.

original: de zhes pa ni gang du yang dag pa'i don gyi ngo bo'i sku ste /
analyzed: de zhes pa ni gang du yang dag pa'i don gyi ngo bo'i sku ste /
translated: That is the body of the nature of the meaning of reality.

original: yum chen mor gsungs pa de 'dir bshad de /
analyzed: yum chen mor gsungs pa de 'dir bshad de /
translated: What was taught in the Great Mother is explained here.

original: chos ni ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyi don dam pa la /
analyzed: chos ni ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyi don dam pa la /
translated: Dharma is the meaning of reality, which is the nature of non-inherent existence.

original: sku ni gang dag la de'o //
analyzed: sku ni gang dag la de'o //
translated: Body is that which exists in that.

original: // / de ltar mos pa nyi shu rtsa bdun sgom pa po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spro ba skyes pa'i phyir sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyis go rims ji lta ba bzhin du de nyid la nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi bstod pa la sogs pa gsungs
analyzed: // / de ltar mos pa nyi shu rtsa bdun sgom pa po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spro ba skyes pa'i phyir sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyis go rims ji lta ba bzhin du de nyid la nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi bstod pa la sogs pa gsungs
translated: Thus, in order to generate enthusiasm in the bodhisattvas who are meditating on the twenty seven aspects of interest, the buddhas and so on praise them in order, with twenty seven praises and so forth.

original: par mdzad de /
analyzed: par mdzad de /
translated: Thus, the Buddhas and so on, in order to generate enthusiasm in the bodhisattvas who meditate on the twenty seven aspects of interest, praise them, etc. in twenty seven ways, in accordance with their order.

original: bstod pas na bstod pa'o //üîΩbkur bas na bkur ba la /
analyzed: bstod pas na bstod pa'o // bkur bas na bkur ba la /
translated: Praise is praise.üîΩRespect is respect.

original: bsngags pas na bsngags pa zhes pa'i don te /
analyzed: bsngags pas na bsngags pa zhes pa'i don te /
translated: Eulogy is eulogy.

original: bstan bcos las /üîΩshes rab pha rol phyin pa yi //
analyzed: bstan bcos las / shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi //
translated: The treatise says:üîΩIn the stages of interest

original: mos pa'i gnas skabs rnams la ni //
analyzed: mos pa'i gnas skabs rnams la ni //
translated: in the perfection of wisdom,üîΩpraise, respect, and eulogy

original: dgu tshan gsum gyis bstod pa dang // bkur ba dang ni bsngags par 'dod //
analyzed: dgu tshan gsum gyis bstod pa dang // bkur ba dang ni bsngags par 'dod //
translated: are asserted in three groups of nine.

original: ces te / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gang zhig mos pa sngon du bshad pa'i mos pa gsum dgur byas pa de'i yon tan 'byung ba snyed kyi dbye ba rnams kyi gsum po la dgur byas pa rnams la go rims bzhin du bstod pa dang bkur baüîΩdang bsngags par 'dod de /üîΩde la gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: ces te / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gang zhig mos pa sngon du bshad pa'i mos pa gsum dgur byas pa de'i yon tan 'byung ba snyed kyi dbye ba rnams kyi gsum po la dgur byas pa rnams la go rims bzhin du bstod pa dang bkur ba dang bsngags par 'dod de / de la gsungs pa ni /
translated: Thus, the qualities of those who have faith in the perfection of wisdom, which is divided into the three faiths explained above, are divided into nine, and the three are to be praised, respected, and extolled, respectively.üîΩThe explanation of that is as follows.

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Then, etc.

original: gang zhig lhag par mos zhes pas 'brel @97a * //
analyzed: gang zhig lhag par mos zhes pas 'brel @97a * //
translated: The one who has faith, etc.

original: te ; ji ltar tshul dang ma bral ba zhes bya ba'i bar ro //
analyzed: te ; ji ltar tshul dang ma bral ba zhes bya ba'i bar ro //
translated: Up to not separated from the method.üîΩThrough clear faith, etc.

original: mngon par dad pas zhes pas 'di'i bshad pa ni rab tu rtogs pas zhes pa ste /
analyzed: mngon par dad pas zhes pas 'di'i bshad pa ni rab tu rtogs pas zhes pa ste /
translated: The explanation of this is through clear understanding.

original: 'di nyid kho na la dad par bya zhes pa'i don to //üîΩbsam pa la la de'i dge ba'i chos rnams 'dir bsam pas bsam pa ste /
analyzed: 'di nyid kho na la dad par bya zhes pa'i don to // bsam pa la la de'i dge ba'i chos rnams 'dir bsam pas bsam pa ste /
translated: The meaning is that one should have faith in this alone.

original: chu yi zam pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: chu yi zam pa lta bu'o //
translated: Some think that the virtuous qualities of that are thought here, so thought is like a bridge of water.

original: de yang dad pa dang 'dun pa dag ste /
analyzed: de yang dad pa dang 'dun pa dag ste /
translated: Moreover, it is faith and aspiration.

original: lhag par khyad par du 'phags pa'i bsam pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa des so //
analyzed: lhag par khyad par du 'phags pa'i bsam pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa des so //
translated: especially, by the superior intention, which is the most excellent intention.

original: nyan par byed pa ni don dang gzhung dag go //
analyzed: nyan par byed pa ni don dang gzhung dag go //
translated: Listening is to the meaning and the text.

original: gzung bar byed pa ni rjod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gzung bar byed pa ni rjod par byed pa'o //
translated: Upholding is by means of expression.üîΩPreserving is by means of mental placement.

original: 'chang bar byed pa ni sems la gzhag par byed pa la klog par byed pa ni 'don par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'chang bar byed pa ni sems la gzhag par byed pa la klog par byed pa ni 'don par byed pa'o //
translated: Reading is by means of recitation.

original: kun chub par byed pa ni rnam pa thams cad rtogs par byed pa la /
analyzed: kun chub par byed pa ni rnam pa thams cad rtogs par byed pa la /
translated: Mastering is by means of understanding all aspects.

original: rab tu 'don par byed pa ni gzhan rnams la kun tu spel bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu 'don par byed pa ni gzhan rnams la kun tu spel bar byed pa'o //
translated: Propagation is by means of spreading to others.

original: 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa ni gzhan dag la ston par bye pa ni gzhung gis smra bar byed pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa ni gzhan dag la ston par bye pa ni gzhung gis smra bar byed pa'i phyir la /
translated: The extensive explanation of this is as follows: Teaching to others is by means of the text, because one speaks with the text.

original: nye bar ston par byed pa ni don no //
analyzed: nye bar ston par byed pa ni don no //
translated: Indicating is by means of the meaning.

original: lung 'bogs par ni don smra ba'o //
analyzed: lung 'bogs par ni don smra ba'o //
translated: Instructing is by means of the meaning.

original: kha ton tu byed pa ni shin tu goms par byed pa'i phyir yang nas yang du kha ton byed pas so //
analyzed: kha ton tu byed pa ni shin tu goms par byed pa'i phyir yang nas yang du kha ton byed pas so //
translated: Reciting is by means of recitation, because one recites again and again in order to become very familiar with it.

original: rgya cher bcas pa ni mang po rnams la kun tu ston pas so //
analyzed: rgya cher bcas pa ni mang po rnams la kun tu ston pas so //
translated: The extensive is for the many, because it is taught to many.

original: yang dag par rab tu ston pa ni bya ba rtag par rab tu ston par byed pas te gzhung gis so //
analyzed: yang dag par rab tu ston pa ni bya ba rtag par rab tu ston par byed pas te gzhung gis so //
translated: The correct teaching is for the constant practice of the duties, as stated in the text.

original: rnam par 'grel ba ni rgya chen pos so //
analyzed: rnam par 'grel ba ni rgya chen pos so //
translated: The explanation is extensive.

original: yid kyis rjes su rtog pa ni sems kyis rjes su brtags pa las kun tu sbyor bar byas nas lta bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: yid kyis rjes su rtog pa ni sems kyis rjes su brtags pa las kun tu sbyor bar byas nas lta bar byed pa ste /
translated: The mental investigation is the connection with the view, having investigated with the mind.

original: zhi gnas skyed par byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhi gnas skyed par byed pa'o //
translated: The pacification is the generation of calm.

original: yongs su dpyod par byed pa ni rnam par brtags pa rnams kyis lhag mthong skyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yongs su dpyod par byed pa ni rnam par brtags pa rnams kyis lhag mthong skyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The analysis is the generation of insight, by means of the investigations.

original: 'dis ni spyod pa ston te /
analyzed: 'dis ni spyod pa ston te /
translated: This shows the practice.

original: 'di las med pas na chung ngu na zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di las med pas na chung ngu na zhes pa'o //
translated: The small is the small, because there is nothing smaller than that.

original: 'chang bar byed pa ni mi 'jigs par byed pa la /
analyzed: 'chang bar byed pa ni mi 'jigs par byed pa la /
translated: The holding is the making fearless.

original: 'jog pa ni rang gi khyim la sogs par te /üîΩbstod pa gsum po rnams kyis zhes pa ste /
analyzed: 'jog pa ni rang gi khyim la sogs par te / bstod pa gsum po rnams kyis zhes pa ste /
translated: The placing is in one‚Äôs own house, etc.

original: tshul dang ma bral bar zhes pa'i bar gyis so //
analyzed: tshul dang ma bral bar zhes pa'i bar gyis so //
translated: The three praises are stated in the text from ‚Äúthe praise of the Dharma‚Äù up to ‚Äúthe praise of the Sangha.‚ÄùüîΩThe praise of the Dharma is stated in the text from ‚Äúthe praise of the Dharma‚Äù up to ‚Äúthe praise of the Sangha.‚Äù

original: 'phags pa dam pa rnams kyi lam gyi chos ni dam pa'i chos la /
analyzed: 'phags pa dam pa rnams kyi lam gyi chos ni dam pa'i chos la /
translated: The Dharma of the path of the holy superior persons is the holy Dharma.

original: de yun ring du gnas par byed pa ste /
analyzed: de yun ring du gnas par byed pa ste /
translated: It causes that to remain for a long time.

original: 'di ni thun mong gi'o //
analyzed: 'di ni thun mong gi'o //
translated: This is the common one.

original: dam pa'i chos zhes pa dang po'i bstod pa ni theg pa thams cad pa'i dbang du byas pa'o //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos zhes pa dang po'i bstod pa ni theg pa thams cad pa'i dbang du byas pa'o //
translated: The praise of the first, ‚Äúthe holy Dharma,‚Äù is from the perspective of all vehicles.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshul ni rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshul ni rtogs pa ste /
translated: The way of the buddhas is realization.

original: phal che ba can gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: phal che ba can gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: It is the perfection of wisdom that is the most common.

original: de la sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig ces pas @97b 'di gzhag par bya zhes pa'i bstod pa gnyis pa ni sangs rgyas kyi dbang du byas pa'o //
analyzed: de la sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig ces pas @97b 'di gzhag par bya zhes pa'i bstod pa gnyis pa ni sangs rgyas kyi dbang du byas pa'o //
translated: The second praise, ‚Äúthis should be established so that the way of the buddhas does not cease,‚Äù is from the perspective of the buddhas.

original: tshul dang ma bral bar zhes pa 'di gzhag par bya zhes pa ni bstod pa gsum pa ste /
analyzed: tshul dang ma bral bar zhes pa 'di gzhag par bya zhes pa ni bstod pa gsum pa ste /
translated: The third praise, ‚Äúthis should be established so that it is not divorced from the way,‚Äù

original: byang chub sems dpa'i dbang du byas pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i dbang du byas pa'o //
translated: is from the perspective of the bodhisattvas.

original: 'dir don chen po dang 'bras bu chen po zhes pa ni don du gnyer ba po 'dis te /
analyzed: 'dir don chen po dang 'bras bu chen po zhes pa ni don du gnyer ba po 'dis te /
translated: Here ‚Äúgreat meaning‚Äù and ‚Äúgreat result‚Äù refer to the one who is striving for that.

original: 'di ni bstan pa la gzhan ni bshad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bstan pa la gzhan ni bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the teaching. The others are explanations.

original: phan yon chen po ni ji skad bshad pa'i phan yon rnams kyis so //
analyzed: phan yon chen po ni ji skad bshad pa'i phan yon rnams kyis so //
translated: Great benefit is from the benefits as explained.

original: 'bras bu chen po ni rgyun du zhugs pa nyid la sogs pa rnams dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu chen po ni rgyun du zhugs pa nyid la sogs pa rnams dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar rnams kyi'o //
translated: Great fruit is from the fruits of stream-entry, etc., up to perfect buddhahood.

original: rnam par smin ba che ba ni 'phags pa rnam pa thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par smin ba che ba ni 'phags pa rnam pa thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Great evolutionary development is from the perfection of all aspects of the ƒÅrya.

original: de bzhin du mang po zhes pa la sogs pa ni nye bar bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du mang po zhes pa la sogs pa ni nye bar bsdu ba'o //
translated: Similarly, ‚Äúmany‚Äù and so on are summaries.

original: yongs su mi gtang bar bya ba ni yongs su gzung zhing gtang bar mi bya ba'o //
analyzed: yongs su mi gtang bar bya ba ni yongs su gzung zhing gtang bar mi bya ba'o //
translated: Not to be abandoned means to be taken up and not to be given up.

original: bsrung bar bya ba ni me dang byi ba la sogs pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: bsrung bar bya ba ni me dang byi ba la sogs pa rnams la'o //
translated: To be protected means from fire, rats, and so on.

original: sba bar bya ba ni rkun po la sogs pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: sba bar bya ba ni rkun po la sogs pa rnams la'o //
translated: To be concealed means from thieves, etc.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: shin tu rnyed par dka' bas so //
analyzed: shin tu rnyed par dka' bas so //
translated: Because it is very difficult to find.

original: lhag par mos pa ni de bzhin du de ltar sems par byed pa'o //
analyzed: lhag par mos pa ni de bzhin du de ltar sems par byed pa'o //
translated: To be devoted to means to be intent on it in that way.

original: bden pa ma yin pa la rab tu 'jug pas ni mos pa brtan par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bden pa ma yin pa la rab tu 'jug pas ni mos pa brtan par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: One does not become firmly devoted by engaging in what is not true.

original: don du gnyer bas don te mchod pa 'dod pas der gnyer ba la shin tu der sbyor bas na 'dun pa'o //
analyzed: don du gnyer bas don te mchod pa 'dod pas der gnyer ba la shin tu der sbyor bas na 'dun pa'o //
translated: One is devoted to the object of one's desire, since one is very much engaged in the object of one's desire, because one desires worship.

original: sbyin par byed pa ni khas len par byed pa'o //üîΩgtod pa ni nye bar byed pa la /
analyzed: sbyin par byed pa ni khas len par byed pa'o // gtod pa ni nye bar byed pa la /
translated: One gives when one promises.üîΩOne bestows when one approaches.

original: 'bul ba la ni len du 'jug par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'bul ba la ni len du 'jug par byed pa'o //
translated: One offers when one requests acceptance.

original: yongs su gtong ba ni yid la gcags pa med pa ste blo ni 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su gtong ba ni yid la gcags pa med pa ste blo ni 'dod pa'o //
translated: One surrenders when one is without regret. One dedicates when one's mind is set on it.

original: yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa ni yon tan dang ngo bo nyid la'o //
analyzed: yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa ni yon tan dang ngo bo nyid la'o //
translated: One extols when one extols its qualities and nature.

original: sbyin par byed pa ni mchod pa'i phyir la ;
analyzed: sbyin par byed pa ni mchod pa'i phyir la ;
translated: One gives when one gives for the sake of worship.

original: yang dag par 'byed pa ni dran pas de rnams kyi lhag par ro myang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang dag par 'byed pa ni dran pas de rnams kyi lhag par ro myang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: One divides when one divides it with mindfulness, in order to savor it.

original: rgya che ba ni yangs pa ste /
analyzed: rgya che ba ni yangs pa ste /
translated: It is vast when it is extensive.

original: des spyod ces pas na yangs pa can no //
analyzed: des spyod ces pas na yangs pa can no //
translated: One practices with it, so it is extensive practice.

original: so so rang gi bdag nyid kyis zhes pa ni bstod pa chung ngu'i chung ngu'o //
analyzed: so so rang gi bdag nyid kyis zhes pa ni bstod pa chung ngu'i chung ngu'o //
translated: It is one's own nature when it is one's own nature. Small is the smallest.

original: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pas ni bstod pa chung ngu'i 'bring ngo //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pas ni bstod pa chung ngu'i 'bring ngo //
translated: Moreover, etc. is the medium of the lesser praise.

original: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Moreover, etc.

original: yang dag par len du gzhug pa ni yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par len du gzhug pa ni yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug pa'o //
translated: To induce to take up is to induce to take up correctly.

original: rab tu gzhog par byed pa ni rim pa las mi 'da' bas so //
analyzed: rab tu gzhog par byed pa ni rim pa las mi 'da' bas so //
translated: To establish is to not go beyond the stages.

original: mngon par dad pa ni /
analyzed: mngon par dad pa ni /
translated: To have full confidence is

original: bcom ldan 'das ma'i yon tan la'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma'i yon tan la'o //
translated: in the qualities of the Bhagavatƒ´.

original: gzhan du na ni yang dag pa'i sbyin pa por mi 'gyur ro//
analyzed: gzhan du na ni yang dag pa'i sbyin pa por mi 'gyur ro//
translated: Otherwise, one would not be a true giver.

original: @98a * // mngon par dad pa las gzhan du na ni rtag par yang dag par len pa'i snod du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @98a * // mngon par dad pa las gzhan du na ni rtag par yang dag par len pa'i snod du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, one would not be a constant vessel for taking up correctly.

original: snyom las ni ngan la zhen pa ste /
analyzed: snyom las ni ngan la zhen pa ste /
translated: Laziness is attachment to evil.

original: snyom las med pa ni brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: snyom las med pa ni brtson 'grus so //
translated: Being without laziness is effort.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' la bcom ldan 'das ma 'dzin du 'jug pa ni byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs nyid pas so //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' la bcom ldan 'das ma 'dzin du 'jug pa ni byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs nyid pas so //
translated: This is the induction of the bodhisattva into the Bhagavatƒ´, because it is the very means for accomplishing enlightenment.

original: yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa ste /
analyzed: yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa ste /
translated: It is the correct teaching,

original: rigs pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: rigs pa rnams kyis so //
translated: by means of the reasonings.

original: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ni klog pa dang mchod pa la sogs pa rnams la rab tu gzhug par byed la /
analyzed: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ni klog pa dang mchod pa la sogs pa rnams la rab tu gzhug par byed la /
translated: Engaging means to cause to take up, to cause to read, to cause to worship, and so on.

original: rab tu zhugs pa na gzengs stod par byed pa ste spro bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu zhugs pa na gzengs stod par byed pa ste spro bar byed pa'o //
translated: Encouraging means to inspire, to make enthusiastic.

original: brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnams la ni bstod pa rnams kyis yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnams la ni bstod pa rnams kyis yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa'o //
translated: Rejoicing means to rejoice with those who have undertaken the practice of striving.

original: 'jig rten phyin ci log pas de yis mi nus so zhes gsungs pa ni tshig gis mtshon pa ni dad pa can la des mthu dang ldan pa'i ngang nyid du gyur pas so //
analyzed: 'jig rten phyin ci log pas de yis mi nus so zhes gsungs pa ni tshig gis mtshon pa ni dad pa can la des mthu dang ldan pa'i ngang nyid du gyur pas so //
translated: The statement because of the world's error, one is unable to do that is an indication of the words. One who has faith is able to do that, because one has become powerful through that.

original: kha phyir phyogs pa rnams la rnam par mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: kha phyir phyogs pa rnams la rnam par mtshon pa ste /
translated: Indicating is for those who are averse to the teaching.

original: lta ba ngan pa rnams la rigs pa rnams kyis gnod par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lta ba ngan pa rnams la rigs pa rnams kyis gnod par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because one refutes bad views with reasonings.

original: btang snyoms pa la rjes su mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: btang snyoms pa la rjes su mtshon pa ste /
translated: Indicating is for those who are indifferent.

original: rjes su chags par byed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ma de'i yon tan brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su chags par byed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ma de'i yon tan brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because one praises the Bhagavatƒ´ in order to cause them to be attached.

original: de ltar snod du byas pa la don zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar snod du byas pa la don zhes pa'o //
translated: Thus, having become a vessel, one is a recipient of the meaning.

original: rnam par sbyong bar byed pa ni lta ba ngan pa rnams la gnod par byed pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ'di ltar ni the tshom can rnams the tshom med par byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnam par sbyong bar byed pa ni lta ba ngan pa rnams la gnod par byed pa'i phyir ro // 'di ltar ni the tshom can rnams the tshom med par byed par 'gyur te /
translated: One is purified because one is freed from the harm of bad views.

original: rigs pa gzhan rnams kyis so //
analyzed: rigs pa gzhan rnams kyis so //
translated: In this way, one becomes free from doubt through the other reasonings.

original: slobs shig pa ni bslab pa gsum po rnams kyis slob par byed pa ste /
analyzed: slobs shig pa ni bslab pa gsum po rnams kyis slob par byed pa ste /
translated: One is instructed because one is instructed in the three trainings.

original: bsam pas spyad pa ni zhi gnas kyis so //
analyzed: bsam pas spyad pa ni zhi gnas kyis so //
translated: One is made to practice through the attitude of tranquility.üîΩOne is made to strive through insight.

original: 'bad pa ni lhag mthong gis la sems can gyi khams ni sems can gyi phung po'o //
analyzed: 'bad pa ni lhag mthong gis la sems can gyi khams ni sems can gyi phung po'o //
translated: The realm of sentient beings is the mass of sentient beings.

original: shin tu mthar thug par 'gyur ba'i phyir bla na med pa la /
analyzed: shin tu mthar thug par 'gyur ba'i phyir bla na med pa la /
translated: One is made to reach the ultimate because of the unsurpassed.

original: phung po ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga pa ste /
analyzed: phung po ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga pa ste /
translated: The aggregates are the five appropriative aggregates.

original: zag pa dang bcas pa rnams so //
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa rnams so //
translated: They are contaminated.

original: de rnams ma lus par zad par byed pa ni de'i rgyu mtshan gyi mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba'i sgrib pa rnams zad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams ma lus par zad par byed pa ni de'i rgyu mtshan gyi mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba'i sgrib pa rnams zad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: One is made to completely exhaust them because the obscurations that are the signs of those are exhausted.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha'i rab tu dbye ba ni chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa nyid dang ro gcig pa nyid kyis zag pa med pa'i phung po lnga tsam lhag pa nyid do //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha'i rab tu dbye ba ni chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa nyid dang ro gcig pa nyid kyis zag pa med pa'i phung po lnga tsam lhag pa nyid do //
translated: The classification of the perfect end is just the five undefiled aggregates, because of being of one taste with the extremely pure dharma-element.

original: de yis de ltar zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de yis de ltar zhes pa ste /
translated: By that, thus means

analyzed: dge ba bcu la rab tu dgod pa la sogs pa'o zhes pa ni chung ngu'i chen po'o //
translated: by that, by the ten virtues, etc.üîΩThe five praises are to be placed, etc.üîΩ The phrase what do you think? etc. is the latter part.

analyzed: bstod pa lnga po rnams kyi zhog ces pa la @98b sogs pa ni snga ma'i cha la /

original: rnam grangs kyis ni bye brag gis te //üîΩdngos po gsum gyi mos pas gnas //
analyzed: rnam grangs kyis ni bye brag gis te // dngos po gsum gyi mos pas gnas //
translated: The phrase what do you think? etc. is the latter part.

original: zhes pa'i don te /
analyzed: zhes pa'i don te /
