translated: The phrase what do you think?

original: 'di rnams go rims bzhin du 'bring gi chung ngu dang / 'bring gi 'bring dang / 'bring gi chen po dang / chen po'i chung ngu dang / chen po'i 'bring gi bstod pa'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams go rims bzhin du 'bring gi chung ngu dang / 'bring gi 'bring dang / 'bring gi chen po dang / chen po'i chung ngu dang / chen po'i 'bring gi bstod pa'o //
translated: These are, respectively, praise of the small of the medium, the medium of the medium, the great of the medium, the small of the great, and the medium of the great.

original: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa lnga dang / zhog ces pa dgu mdo las bshad pas bsod nams bla lhag pa la sogs pa bla lhag pa'i spyod pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa lnga dang / zhog ces pa dgu mdo las bshad pas bsod nams bla lhag pa la sogs pa bla lhag pa'i spyod pa ste /
translated: The five beginning with ‚ÄúMoreover‚Äù and the nine beginning with ‚ÄúPlace‚Äù are explained in the s≈´tra. Therefore, the conduct of the superior is superior merit, and so on.

original: snga ma dang phyi ma rnams kyi gzhung ma tshang ba yod na yang bsnan par bya ba'o //
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma rnams kyi gzhung ma tshang ba yod na yang bsnan par bya ba'o //
translated: Although the earlier and later texts are incomplete, they should be supplemented.

original: bsam gtan bzhi la bkod ces pa ni de yang bsam gtan po ni 'dod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams la mi sbyor zhing /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi la bkod ces pa ni de yang bsam gtan po ni 'dod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams la mi sbyor zhing /
translated: ‚ÄúEstablished in the four meditative concentrations‚Äù means that the meditative concentrations do not connect with the afflictions of the desire realm.

original: 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams la dmigs pa med pa'i phyir na 'dod pa rnams kyis dben pa la nyon mongs pa dang / 'dod pa'i rgyu rnams kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa'i mi dge ba rnams dang bral ba'i phyir rnam par rtog pa dang bcas shing rnam par dpyod pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams la dmigs pa med pa'i phyir na 'dod pa rnams kyis dben pa la nyon mongs pa dang / 'dod pa'i rgyu rnams kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa'i mi dge ba rnams dang bral ba'i phyir rnam par rtog pa dang bcas shing rnam par dpyod pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Because it is not focused on desirable things, it is secluded from desire. Because it is free from the nonvirtuous misdeeds of body, speech, and mind that are the causes of desire, it is associated with investigation and analysis.

original: 'dod pa'i gnyen por rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa dag dang kun tu sbyor bas 'dod pa'i don grub ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i gnyen por rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa dag dang kun tu sbyor bas 'dod pa'i don grub ste /
translated: The investigation and analysis that are the antidotes to desire are connected with it, and the purpose of desire is accomplished.

original: lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pas dga' ba dang bde ba dang lhan cig par gyur pa la snyoms par zhugs na so sor nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pas dga' ba dang bde ba dang lhan cig par gyur pa la snyoms par zhugs na so sor nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When one enters into and abides in the meditative absorption that is accompanied by joy and pleasure, one experiences it individually.

original: gnyis pa ni rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa dag gis sems bskyod par byed pa dag gi skyon mthong bas de dag las sems rnam par log pa la mnyam par gzhag pa de rnams thams cad nas thams cad du rab tu spangs nas rnam par rtog pa med cing rnam par dpyod paüîΩmed pa nyid kyis nang gi bdag nyid rab tu dang ba la sbyor ba can no //
analyzed: gnyis pa ni rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa dag gis sems bskyod par byed pa dag gi skyon mthong bas de dag las sems rnam par log pa la mnyam par gzhag pa de rnams thams cad nas thams cad du rab tu spangs nas rnam par rtog pa med cing rnam par dpyod pa med pa nyid kyis nang gi bdag nyid rab tu dang ba la sbyor ba can no //
translated: It is completely free from all discursive thought and analysis, and it is associated with an inner clarity that is free from discursive thought and analysis.

original: gsum pa ni btang snyom par rigs pa nyid kyis rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa bzhin du dga' ba dang btang snyoms pa'i phyir dran pa dang shes bzhin dang lhan cig pas dga' ba'i go skabs mi phyed nas de gnyis kyis shes rab lan mang
analyzed: gsum pa ni btang snyom par rigs pa nyid kyis rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa bzhin du dga' ba dang btang snyoms pa'i phyir dran pa dang shes bzhin dang lhan cig pas dga' ba'i go skabs mi phyed nas de gnyis kyis shes rab lan mang
translated: The third is the one-pointed concentration that is associated with equanimity, mindfulness, and introspection, and it is free from the pleasure of joy and equanimity, like the pleasure of discursive thought and analysis.

original: du byed pas gzugs kyi lus dang yid dag gis bde ba mya ngan shin tu sbyangs pa la sbyor bas bde ba dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: du byed pas gzugs kyi lus dang yid dag gis bde ba mya ngan shin tu sbyangs pa la sbyor bas bde ba dang bcas pa'o //
translated: It is associated with the pleasure of pliancy, which is a physical pleasure and a mental pleasure.

original: @99a * // bzhi pa la ni bde ba yang med cing sdug bsngal ba yang med la /
analyzed: @99a * // bzhi pa la ni bde ba yang med cing sdug bsngal ba yang med la /
translated: In the fourth, there is neither pleasure nor pain,

original: bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba'i yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba dag kyang snga nas spangs pas bsam gtan bzhi pas bde ba yang btang snyoms par dran pa yongs su dag nas de dag gis 'dir shin tu rnam par dag pa thob pas so //
analyzed: bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba'i yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba dag kyang snga nas spangs pas bsam gtan bzhi pas bde ba yang btang snyoms par dran pa yongs su dag nas de dag gis 'dir shin tu rnam par dag pa thob pas so //
translated: and since mental pleasure and mental pain, which are associated with pleasure and pain, have already been abandoned, the fourth meditation is equanimity that is pure mindfulness, which is the relinquishing of pleasure.

original: de la bsam gtan dang po la yan lag lnga ste /
analyzed: de la bsam gtan dang po la yan lag lnga ste /
translated: The first meditation has five branches:

original: rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa dag ni gnyen po'i yan lag ste /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa dag ni gnyen po'i yan lag ste /
translated: Discursive thought and investigative thought are the branches of antidotes,

original: de gnyis kyis 'dod pa dang / gnod sems dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang / rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa spong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gnyis kyis 'dod pa dang / gnod sems dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang / rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa spong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because they abandon desire, malice, violence, and discursive thought.

original: dga' ba dang / bde ba ni phan yon gyi yan lag go //
analyzed: dga' ba dang / bde ba ni phan yon gyi yan lag go //
translated: Joy and pleasure are the branches of benefit.

original: sems rtse gcig pa nyid ni de gnyis ka'i rten gyi yan lag ste /
analyzed: sems rtse gcig pa nyid ni de gnyis ka'i rten gyi yan lag ste /
translated: One-pointedness of mind is the branch of support for both of those.

original: ting nge 'dzin la brten pa'i mthus dge ba la rnam par rtog pa la sogs pa la 'jug pas so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la brten pa'i mthus dge ba la rnam par rtog pa la sogs pa la 'jug pas so //
translated: Because of the power of concentration, one enters into the virtuous discriminations, etc.

original: gnyis pa la bzhi ste //
analyzed: gnyis pa la bzhi ste //
translated: The second has four members:

original: nang rab tu dang ba gnyen po'i yan lag la /
analyzed: nang rab tu dang ba gnyen po'i yan lag la /
translated: inner serenity is the member of the antidote;

original: lhag ma'i yan lag ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma'i yan lag ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: the remaining members are as before.

original: gsum pa la lnga ste /
analyzed: gsum pa la lnga ste /
translated: The third has five members:

original: btang snyoms dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin ni gnyen po'i yan lag la /
analyzed: btang snyoms dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin ni gnyen po'i yan lag la /
translated: equanimity, mindfulness, and awareness are the members of the antidote;

original: bde ba ni phan yon gyi yan lag go //
analyzed: bde ba ni phan yon gyi yan lag go //
translated: pleasure is the member of benefit;

original: rten gyi yan lag ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: rten gyi yan lag ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: the member of support is as before.

original: bzhi pa la yan lag bzhi ste /
analyzed: bzhi pa la yan lag bzhi ste /
translated: The fourth has four members:

original: btang snyoms yongs su dag pa dang / dran pa yongs su dag pa ni gnyen po'i yan lag la /
analyzed: btang snyoms yongs su dag pa dang / dran pa yongs su dag pa ni gnyen po'i yan lag la /
translated: pure equanimity and pure mindfulness are the members of the antidote;

original: sdug bsngal med cing bde ba med pas myong ba ni phan yon gyi yan lag go //
analyzed: sdug bsngal med cing bde ba med pas myong ba ni phan yon gyi yan lag go //
translated: the experience of neither pleasure nor suffering is the member of benefit;

original: rten gyi yan lag ni gong ma bzhin no //
analyzed: rten gyi yan lag ni gong ma bzhin no //
translated: the member of support is as before.

original: de la bsam gtan dang po bsgoms pa chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po'i tshul gyis go rims bzhin du tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa mdun na 'don dang / tshangs pa chen po dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la bsam gtan dang po bsgoms pa chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po'i tshul gyis go rims bzhin du tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa mdun na 'don dang / tshangs pa chen po dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In that, by the small, medium, and great cultivation of the first concentration, one is born respectively in the same fortune as the class of BrahmakƒÅyika, Brahmapurohita, and MahƒÅbrahma.

original: gnyis pas ni 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal rnams dang ngo //
analyzed: gnyis pas ni 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal rnams dang ngo //
translated: By the second, in Parƒ´ttƒÅbha, ApramƒÅ·πáƒÅbha, and ƒÄbhƒÅsvara.

original: gsum pas ni dge chung dang / dge chen dang / tshad med dge rnams so //
analyzed: gsum pas ni dge chung dang / dge chen dang / tshad med dge rnams so //
translated: By the third, in Parƒ´tta≈õubha, ApramƒÅ·πáa≈õubha, and ≈öubhak·πõtsna.

original: bzhi pas ni sprin med dang / bsod nams 'phel dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang ngo //
analyzed: bzhi pas ni sprin med dang / bsod nams 'phel dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang ngo //
translated: By the fourth, in Anabhraka, Pu·πáyaprasava, and Brhatphala.

original: de lta bu ni bsam gtan bzhi po de rnams la dgod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu ni bsam gtan bzhi po de rnams la dgod par byed pa'o //
translated: That is the establishment in those four concentrations.

original: de'i gong du ni gnas gtsang ma lnga ste /
analyzed: de'i gong du ni gnas gtsang ma lnga ste /
translated: Above that are the five pure abodes.

original: de rnams su ni 'phags pa kho na skye bar 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: de rnams su ni 'phags pa kho na skye bar 'gyur ba ste /
translated: Only ƒÅryas are born there.

original: 'di ni bkur pa chen po'i chen po'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bkur pa chen po'i chen po'o //
translated: This is the great of the great honors.

original: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Moreover, etc.

original: mchog bsnan pa ni snga ma bzhin la /
analyzed: mchog bsnan pa ni snga ma bzhin la /
translated: The supreme is added as before.

original: tshad med @99b pa ni rnam par bshad zin to //
analyzed: tshad med @99b pa ni rnam par bshad zin to //
translated: The immeasurables have already been explained.üîΩThe four formless states are the formless realm.

original: gzugs med pa bzhi nyid ni gzugs med pa rnams la de la sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa gzugs kyis sgrib cing thogs pa na /
analyzed: gzugs med pa bzhi nyid ni gzugs med pa rnams la de la sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa gzugs kyis sgrib cing thogs pa na /
translated: When form such as blue, yellow and so on obscures and obstructs the formless realm,üîΩthose attached to various pleasant discriminations cultivate the perception of infinite space everywhere and thus all appearances cease.

original: 'du shes sna tshogs pa bde bar chags pa rnams la thams cad du nam mkha'i 'du shes bsgoms pas de rnams rnam pa thams cad du snang bar mi 'gyur nas nam mkha' mtha' yas pa nyid do zhes pa ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la kun tu
analyzed: 'du shes sna tshogs pa bde bar chags pa rnams la thams cad du nam mkha'i 'du shes bsgoms pas de rnams rnam pa thams cad du snang bar mi 'gyur nas nam mkha' mtha' yas pa nyid do zhes pa ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la kun tu
translated: The base of infinite space is the meditative attainment of infinite space.

original: dmigs pa 'di ni de ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las nye bar bskyed nas gnas so //
analyzed: dmigs pa 'di ni de ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las nye bar bskyed nas gnas so //
translated: This meditative attainment is generated from the base of infinite space and then abides.

original: de shes pa gang gis nam mkha' mtha' yas pa'i skye mched la mos pa dang ldan pa de nyid la mtha' yas par mos pas thams cad du nam mkha'i 'du shes las rnam par log nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la'o //
analyzed: de shes pa gang gis nam mkha' mtha' yas pa'i skye mched la mos pa dang ldan pa de nyid la mtha' yas par mos pas thams cad du nam mkha'i 'du shes las rnam par log nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la'o //
translated: By what cognition does one enter the sphere of infinite space? By the cognition of the sphere of infinite space, one has confidence in the sphere of infinite space. By the cognition of the sphere of infinite consciousness, one has confidence in the sphere of infinite consciousness.

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las nye bar bskyod nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched la dmigs pas lta bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las nye bar bskyod nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched la dmigs pas lta bar 'gyur la /
translated: Having transcended the sphere of infinite consciousness, one focuses on the sphere of nothingness and enters the sphere of nothingness.

original: cung zad med ces cung zad med pa nyid la dmigs par byed pa ni cung zad med pa'i skye mched do //
analyzed: cung zad med ces cung zad med pa nyid la dmigs par byed pa ni cung zad med pa'i skye mched do //
translated: The sphere of nothingness is the sphere in which one focuses on nothingness, thinking ‚Äúthere is nothing at all.‚Äù

original: ci yang med pa'i 'du shes la yang zhen pa dang bral zhing de las yang rnam par log la cung zad kyi 'du shes ni snga nas nub pas 'du shes med pa la phra mo'i 'du shes ni rab tu 'jug pa nyid de de las 'du shes med
analyzed: ci yang med pa'i 'du shes la yang zhen pa dang bral zhing de las yang rnam par log la cung zad kyi 'du shes ni snga nas nub pas 'du shes med pa la phra mo'i 'du shes ni rab tu 'jug pa nyid de de las 'du shes med
translated: Having become free from attachment to the perception of nothingness and having transcended it, and having previously eliminated the perception of something, one enters the sphere of neither perception nor nonperception.

original: pa ste / gang 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi ting nge 'dzin de ni 'du shes med min gyi skye mched de /
analyzed: pa ste / gang 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi ting nge 'dzin de ni 'du shes med min gyi skye mched de /
translated: The meditative stabilization of the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception is the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: srid pa'i rtse mo'i snyoms par 'jug pa so sor nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: srid pa'i rtse mo'i snyoms par 'jug pa so sor nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One experiences the meditative attainment of the peak of existence.

original: yan lag gi rnam par gzhag pa ni 'di rnams las gzhan pa'i yan lag gi rnam par gzhag pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yan lag gi rnam par gzhag pa ni 'di rnams las gzhan pa'i yan lag gi rnam par gzhag pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: There is no other presentation of branches than these.

original: zhi gnas su ro gcig pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ni bkur ba dang po'o //üîΩzhog ces pa la sogs pa dang / re re bzhin pha rol tu phyin pa de ji snyam du sems zhes pa la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i go rims bzhin du chung ngu'i 'bring dang / chung ngu'i chen po dang / 'bring gi chung ngu dang /
analyzed: zhi gnas su ro gcig pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ni bkur ba dang po'o // zhog ces pa la sogs pa dang / re re bzhin pha rol tu phyin pa de ji snyam du sems zhes pa la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i go rims bzhin du chung ngu'i 'bring dang / chung ngu'i chen po dang / 'bring gi chung ngu dang /
translated: Because they are of one taste in calm abiding. This is the first praise.üîΩThe middle of the small, the great of the small, the small of the medium,

original: 'bring gi 'bring dang / 'bring gi chen po bkur ba'o //
analyzed: 'bring gi 'bring dang / 'bring gi chen po bkur ba'o //
translated: the medium of the medium, and the great of the medium are praised, respectively, by ‚Äúplace,‚Äù etc., and by ‚ÄúWhat do you think, Subh≈´ti?‚Äù etc.

original: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Moreover, etc.

original: 'dir rang gis kyang klog pa dang gzhan dag la yang bris nas sbyin par byed pa'i spyod pa bla lhag pa'o zhes pa ni chen po'i chung ngu'i bkur ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir rang gis kyang klog pa dang gzhan dag la yang bris nas sbyin par byed pa'i spyod pa bla lhag pa'o zhes pa ni chen po'i chung ngu'i bkur ba'o //
translated: Here, the conduct of reading oneself and giving it to others by writing it out is the best. This is the lesser of the great.

original: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Moreover, etc.

original: 'di'i don rnam par 'byed par bya zhes pa la sogs @100a * //
analyzed: 'di'i don rnam par 'byed par bya zhes pa la sogs @100a * //
translated: The meaning of this is to be analyzed, etc.

original: pa ni snga nas bshad zin to //
analyzed: pa ni snga nas bshad zin to //
translated: This has been explained previously.

original: de'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa rnams ni rgya chen po'i ngo bo las ma dad pa rnams la rab tu dad par byed par 'dod la /
analyzed: de'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa rnams ni rgya chen po'i ngo bo las ma dad pa rnams la rab tu dad par byed par 'dod la /
translated: The perfections, etc., are for those who lack faith in the vast nature of reality, in order to generate faith.

original: 'dir 'khor gsum mi dmigs pa la sogs pa can ni don dam pa la mngon par dgongs nas gsungs pa ni don la mkhas pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir 'khor gsum mi dmigs pa la sogs pa can ni don dam pa la mngon par dgongs nas gsungs pa ni don la mkhas pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Here, the non-apprehension of the three spheres, etc., is taught with the intention of the ultimate, as is said beginning with ‚Äúskill in the meaning.

original: don la mkhas pa de nyid kyi don yid la byas nas klog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don la mkhas pa de nyid kyi don yid la byas nas klog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚Äù The one who is skilled in the meaning, having taken that meaning to mind, reads it.

original: yig 'bru dang bcas pa rnams kyis de nyid kyi don rjod par byed pa ni yi ge rnams so //
analyzed: yig 'bru dang bcas pa rnams kyis de nyid kyi don rjod par byed pa ni yi ge rnams so //
translated: The letters are the expression of that meaning by those who have the letters.

original: nye bar ston pa ni de'i don mdos yang dag par nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nye bar ston pa ni de'i don mdos yang dag par nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The teaching is the meaning of that, because it is ascertained by the sutras.

original: yongs su gsal bar byed pa ni rigs pa rnams kyis zhes pa ni bla lhag pa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yongs su gsal bar byed pa ni rigs pa rnams kyis zhes pa ni bla lhag pa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The clarification is by means of reasonings. This is called the conduct of the superior.

original: 'dir zhes pa ni brgyad pa la gnas pa la de nas zhes pa ni bdun pa la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir zhes pa ni brgyad pa la gnas pa la de nas zhes pa ni bdun pa la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here refers to the one abiding in the eighth stage, and then refers to the one abiding in the seventh stage.

original: 'di yang nye bar bstan par bya ba'am zhes pa ni mgo smad nas gsol ba 'debs pa'am 'dri ba'o //
analyzed: 'di yang nye bar bstan par bya ba'am zhes pa ni mgo smad nas gsol ba 'debs pa'am 'dri ba'o //
translated: This is also to be taught means to request with bowed head or to ask.

original: nye bar bstan par mi bya zhes pa ni yongs su mi gsal ba'i phyir zhes pa la dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar bstan par mi bya zhes pa ni yongs su mi gsal ba'i phyir zhes pa la dgongs pa'o //
translated: Should not be taught means that it should not be clarified, as that is the intention.

original: rtogs par ma gyur pa ni blo rmongs pa ste /
analyzed: rtogs par ma gyur pa ni blo rmongs pa ste /
translated: Not understanding means being confused.

original: des lung dang rigs pa dag gis yang dag par zin pa'i gzhan gyi tshig de las mi g-yo ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des lung dang rigs pa dag gis yang dag par zin pa'i gzhan gyi tshig de las mi g-yo ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of that, one does not move from the words of others that are correctly grasped by scripture and reasoning.

original: de zhes pa ni gang du g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: de zhes pa ni gang du g-yo ba'o //
translated: That refers to where one moves.

original: bcos ma ni mi mthun par snang ba la de'i ste /
analyzed: bcos ma ni mi mthun par snang ba la de'i ste /
translated: The artificial is the appearance of discord, and that is the cause of the artificial.

original: skye ba'i rnam par bshad pa de gsum gyis de ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skye ba'i rnam par bshad pa de gsum gyis de ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because these three explanations of birth show that.

original: de la zhes pa ni de ltar gyur pas so //
analyzed: de la zhes pa ni de ltar gyur pas so //
translated: Therein means in that way.

original: chud thos na mi rung ba ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam la nyams par ma gyur pa'o //üîΩdbang po gzugs can lnga ni lus kyis bsdus pa'i phyir ram /
analyzed: chud thos na mi rung ba ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam la nyams par ma gyur pa'o // dbang po gzugs can lnga ni lus kyis bsdus pa'i phyir ram /
translated: It is not suitable to be lost means that one should not fall away from the path to complete enlightenment.

original: rdul phra rab bsags pa'i phyir lus rnams so //
analyzed: rdul phra rab bsags pa'i phyir lus rnams so //
translated: The five physical faculties are the body because they are included in the body or because they are a collection of subtle particles.

original: de ma bsgoms pa'i ni goms par ma byas pas bsdus pa'i mi gang dag de rnams so //
analyzed: de ma bsgoms pa'i ni goms par ma byas pas bsdus pa'i mi gang dag de rnams so //
translated: Those who have not cultivated those are those who have not become familiar with them.

original: dbang po ma bsdams pa'i phyir ni tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po ma bsdams pa'i phyir ni tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa'o //
translated: Because the faculties are not restrained means that morality has not been cultivated.

original: de la sems ma bsgoms pa ste /
analyzed: de la sems ma bsgoms pa ste /
translated: Therein, the mind has not been cultivated.

original: ting nge 'dzin goms par ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin goms par ma byas pa'o //
translated: Concentration has not become familiar.

original: de las shes rab ma bsgoms pa ste /
analyzed: de las shes rab ma bsgoms pa ste /
translated: From that, wisdom has not been cultivated.

original: mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma shes pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma shes pa'o //
translated: With a mind that is not in equipoise, one does not know reality as it is.

original: de la shes rab 'chal ba ste lta ba ngan pa'o //
analyzed: de la shes rab 'chal ba ste lta ba ngan pa'o //
translated: Therein, there is bad wisdom, which is bad views.

original: des lug ltar lkugs pa dang 'dra ba ste /
analyzed: des lug ltar lkugs pa dang 'dra ba ste /
translated: It is like a sheep,

original: gzhan gyis legs par bshad pa rnams la mi nyan pa'i phyir dang / rang gis legs par gsungs pa mi smra ba'i phyir @100b ro ;
analyzed: gzhan gyis legs par bshad pa rnams la mi nyan pa'i phyir dang / rang gis legs par gsungs pa mi smra ba'i phyir @100b ro ;
translated: because it does not listen to the good explanations of others and does not speak well itself.

original: / shes rab yongs su nyams pa ni yang dag pa'i lta ba las nyams pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: / shes rab yongs su nyams pa ni yang dag pa'i lta ba las nyams pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is a degeneration of wisdom, because it is a degeneration of right view.

original: gzugs mi rtag ces pa ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs mi rtag ces pa ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /
translated: The words ‚Äúimpermanent form‚Äù are an example.

original: sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa la yang blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa la yang blta bar bya'o //
translated: One should also consider ‚Äúsuffering,‚Äù etc.

original: theg pa chen po la rtag pa med ces pas mi rtag pa nyid de /
analyzed: theg pa chen po la rtag pa med ces pas mi rtag pa nyid de /
translated: ‚ÄúThe Mahayana is impermanent‚Äù is impermanence.

original: 'di la gsungs pa ni don zhes pa ste ;
analyzed: 'di la gsungs pa ni don zhes pa ste ;
translated: What is stated here is the ‚Äúmeaning,‚Äù

original: don dam pa ni phung po lnga po rnams stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis so //
analyzed: don dam pa ni phung po lnga po rnams stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis so //
translated: because the ultimate is the five aggregates characterized by emptiness and the absence of an intrinsic nature.

original: gzhan du theg pa chen po pa rnam par rig par smra ba rnams kyis ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig la phyin ci log la gzhan du rnam par bshad pa'i tshul ni g-yang sa bzhin du yongs su spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan du theg pa chen po pa rnam par rig par smra ba rnams kyis ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig la phyin ci log la gzhan du rnam par bshad pa'i tshul ni g-yang sa bzhin du yongs su spang bar bya'o //
translated: Otherwise, the MahƒÅyƒÅnists who are Proponents of Cognition explain the words of emptiness in a way that is mistaken, and that method of explanation should be completely abandoned, like a precipice.

original: des ni yang dag pa'i gsung rab ma rtogs nas de'i sgra don la mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis dngos po'i ngo bor nye bar rtogs par byed pa'i phyin ci log gis de kho na nyid ston par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar nye bar stonüîΩpar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des ni yang dag pa'i gsung rab ma rtogs nas de'i sgra don la mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis dngos po'i ngo bor nye bar rtogs par byed pa'i phyin ci log gis de kho na nyid ston par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar nye bar ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since they do not understand the true scriptures, through the pride of the meaning of those words, they teach suchness in a way that is mistaken, which causes them to understand it as the nature of things, as is taught in the Perfection of Wisdom.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par bshad ces pas rang nyid chud gsan zhing gzhan yang 'jig par byed do //
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par bshad ces pas rang nyid chud gsan zhing gzhan yang 'jig par byed do //
translated: Thus the BhagavƒÅn explains that they themselves are ruined and ruin others.

original: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med par smra bas ni phyin ci ma log pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar ston par 'gyur zhes pa ni chen po'i 'bring gi bkur ba'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med par smra bas ni phyin ci ma log pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar ston par 'gyur zhes pa ni chen po'i 'bring gi bkur ba'o //
translated: The one who teaches the perfection of wisdom without error is the one who teaches the perfection of wisdom. This is the praise of the medium of the great.

original: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa lnga dang zhog ces pa dgu ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa lnga dang zhog ces pa dgu ste /
translated: Moreover,  and so on, five, and should be placed, nine.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa nyid kyi 'bras bu rab tu 'byed ces pa ni rdzogs par byed ces pa ste /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa nyid kyi 'bras bu rab tu 'byed ces pa ni rdzogs par byed ces pa ste /
translated: The one who distinguishes the result of stream entry is the one who accomplishes it.

original: chen po'i chen po'i bkur ba'o //
analyzed: chen po'i chen po'i bkur ba'o //
translated: This is the praise of the great of the great.

original: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa lnga dang zhog ces pa lnga ni chung ngu'i chung ngu'i bsngags pa'o //üîΩgzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa lnga dang zhog ces pa lnga ni chung ngu'i 'bring ngo //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa lnga dang zhog ces pa lnga ni chung ngu'i chung ngu'i bsngags pa'o // gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa lnga dang zhog ces pa lnga ni chung ngu'i 'bring ngo //
translated: Moreover,  and so on, five, and should be placed, five, is the praise of the small of the small.üîΩMoreover,  and so on, five, and should be placed, five, is the medium of the small.üîΩMoreover,  and so on, five, and should be placed, five, is the great of the small.

original: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa lnga dang zhog ces pa lnga ni chung ngu'i chen po'o //üîΩgzhan yang zhes pa ste rang mngon par byang chub pas sangs rgyas la /
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa lnga dang zhog ces pa lnga ni chung ngu'i chen po'o //üîΩgzhan yang zhes pa ste rang mngon par byang chub pas sangs rgyas la /
translated: Moreover,  and so on, five, and should be placed, five, is the small of the medium.üîΩMoreover,  and so on, five, and should be placed, five, is the medium of the medium.üîΩMoreover,  and so on, five, and should be placed, five, is the great of the medium.üîΩMoreover,  and so on, five, and should be placed, five, is the small of the great.üîΩMoreover,  and so on, five, and should be placed, five, is the medium of the great.üîΩMoreover,  and so on, five, and should be placed, five, is the great of the great.üîΩMoreover,  and so on, five, and should be placed, five, is the great of the great.

original: bdag nyid gcig pus so sor sangs rgyas pas rang sangs rgyas so zhes pa ni 'bring gi chung ngu'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid gcig pus so sor sangs rgyas pas rang sangs rgyas so zhes pa ni 'bring gi chung ngu'o //
translated: The middle of the small is the statement, Because one awakens to Buddhahood by oneself alone, one is a Pratyekabuddha.üîΩThe middle of the middle is the statement, Moreover, Subhuti, a Bodhisattva who courses in perfect wisdom, who develops it, etc., and so on up to should stand in the perfection of wisdom.

original: zhog ces pa la sogs pa lngas ni 'bring gi 'bring la'o //üîΩgzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste //
analyzed: zhog ces pa la sogs pa lngas ni 'bring gi 'bring la'o // gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste //
translated: The middle of the great is the statement, Moreover, Subhuti, a Bodhisattva who courses in perfect wisdom, who develops it, etc., and so on up to should stand in the perfection of wisdom.

original: kha cig nyid ces pa ni dang po'o //
analyzed: kha cig nyid ces pa ni dang po'o //
translated: The great of the small is the statement, Moreover, Subhuti, a Bodhisattva who courses in perfect wisdom, who develops it, etc., and so on up to should stand in the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang zhes pa ni gnyis pa'o //üîΩgang zhig rig ces pa ni gsum pa'o //
analyzed: nang zhes pa ni gnyis pa'o // gang zhig rig ces pa ni gsum pa'o //
translated: The great of the middle is the statement, Moreover, Subhuti, a Bodhisattva who courses in perfect wisdom, who develops it, etc., and so on up to should stand in the perfection of wisdom.üîΩ The great of the great is the statement, Moreover, Subhuti, a Bodhisattva who courses in perfect wisdom, who develops it, etc., and so on up to should stand in the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ces pa ni 'phel ba la sogs pa gyur pa ste /üîΩ'phel ba ni mthong ba'i lam la'o //üîΩbrtan pa ni bsgom pa'i lam la'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ces pa ni 'phel ba la sogs pa gyur pa ste / 'phel ba ni mthong ba'i lam la'o // brtan pa ni bsgom pa'i lam la'o //
translated: The small of the small is the statement, Moreover, Subhuti, a Bodhisattva who courses in perfect wisdom, who develops it, etc., and so on up to should stand in the perfection of wisdom.üîΩ The small of the middle is the statement, Moreover, Subhuti, a Bodhisattva who courses in perfect wisdom, who develops it, etc., and so on up to should stand in the perfection of wisdom.

original: yangs pa ni @101a * //üîΩkhyad par gyi lam la'o //
analyzed: yangs pa ni @101a * // khyad par gyi lam la'o //
translated: The small of the great is the statement, Moreover, Subhuti, a Bodhisattva who courses in perfect wisdom, who develops it, etc., and so on up to should stand in the perfection of wisdom.

original: yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la'o //üîΩ'dir zhes pa ni gsum pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la'o // 'dir zhes pa ni gsum pa'o //
translated: The middle of the small is the statement, Moreover, Subhuti, a Bodhisattva who courses in perfect wisdom, who develops it, etc., and so on up to should stand in the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhes pa ni dang po nas dang gsum pa nas zhes pa ni 'bring gi chen po'o //üîΩzhog ces pa la sogs pa lngas ni chen po'i chung ngu'o //
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhes pa ni dang po nas dang gsum pa nas zhes pa ni 'bring gi chen po'o //üîΩzhog ces pa la sogs pa lngas ni chen po'i chung ngu'o //
translated: The middle of the middle is the statement, Moreover, Subhuti, a Bodhisattva who courses in perfect wisdom, who develops it, etc., and so on up to should

original: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Moreover, etc.

original: grangs snga ma'i bsod nams las phyi ma'i bsod nams brgya 'gyur stong 'gyur zhes pa la sogs pa dang bgrang ba ni bcu 'gyur brgya 'gyur zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: grangs snga ma'i bsod nams las phyi ma'i bsod nams brgya 'gyur stong 'gyur zhes pa la sogs pa dang bgrang ba ni bcu 'gyur brgya 'gyur zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The enumeration is a hundredfold, a thousandfold, etc. of the merit of the former, and the latter, and so on.

original: dpe ni gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'gyur zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dpe ni gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'gyur zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The example is as many as the sands of the Ganges River, etc.

original: rgyur ni bcur 'gyur te gang gva'i klung brgya'i bye ma snyed ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rgyur ni bcur 'gyur te gang gva'i klung brgya'i bye ma snyed ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The cause is tenfold, as many as the sands of a hundred Ganges Rivers, etc.

original: tshad shin tu yang mi srid pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: tshad shin tu yang mi srid pa'i phyir la /
translated: Because the measure is extremely impossible,

original: de'i don du gang zhig dpe'am /
analyzed: de'i don du gang zhig dpe'am /
translated: and for that purpose, what is the example,

original: rgyu dang nye ba na mi 'dug pas de yang byed par sla ba ma yin no zhes pa ni chen po'i 'bring ngo //
analyzed: rgyu dang nye ba na mi 'dug pas de yang byed par sla ba ma yin no zhes pa ni chen po'i 'bring ngo //
translated: or the cause, or the near, and not being present, that also is not easy to do.üîΩThis is the medium of the great.

original: zhog ces pa la sogs pas ni chen po'i chen po'i bsngags pa'o //
analyzed: zhog ces pa la sogs pas ni chen po'i chen po'i bsngags pa'o //
translated: By the words, etc. is the praise of the great of the great.

original: bsod nams kyi rnam grangs ni tha dad pa la de gsal bar byed pa ni de'i le'u lnga pa'o /
analyzed: bsod nams kyi rnam grangs ni tha dad pa la de gsal bar byed pa ni de'i le'u lnga pa'o /
translated: The enumeration of merit is different, and that which clarifies it is the fifth chapter.

original: // / chos kyi mchog gi chung ngu'i rnam pa ni yongs su bsngo ba yid la byed pa ste /
analyzed: // / chos kyi mchog gi chung ngu'i rnam pa ni yongs su bsngo ba yid la byed pa ste /
translated: The smallest aspect of supreme dharma is the attention of complete dedication.

original: de'i dbang du byas pa ni bstan bcos las /
analyzed: de'i dbang du byas pa ni bstan bcos las /
translated: The treatise Attainment of Knowledge mentions:

original: yongs su bsngo ba khyad par can //
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ba khyad par can //
translated: The special dedication

original: de yi byed pa mchog yin no //
analyzed: de yi byed pa mchog yin no //
translated: is its supreme function.

original: de ni dmigs med rnam pa can //
analyzed: de ni dmigs med rnam pa can //
translated: It has the aspect of being without objective support,

original: phyin ci ma log mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: phyin ci ma log mtshan nyid do //
translated: and its characteristic is non-erroneous.üîΩIt is the domain of mindfulness of emptiness,

original: dben dang sangs rgyas bsod nams tshogs //
analyzed: dben dang sangs rgyas bsod nams tshogs //
translated: the accumulation of merit of the buddhas,

original: rang bzhin dran pa'i spyod yul can //
analyzed: rang bzhin dran pa'i spyod yul can //
translated: and the nature of the buddhas.üîΩIt is skillful means, the absence of attributes,üîΩrejoicing in the buddhas,üîΩnot belonging to the three realms,

original: thabs mkhas mtshan ma med pa dang // sangs rgyas rjes su yi rang dang // khams gsum gtogs pa ma yin dang // chung dang 'bring dang chen po'o //
analyzed: thabs mkhas mtshan ma med pa dang // sangs rgyas rjes su yi rang dang // khams gsum gtogs pa ma yin dang // chung dang 'bring dang chen po'o //
translated: and small, middling, and great.

original: de bzhin gzhan gyi bsngo ba ste //
analyzed: de bzhin gzhan gyi bsngo ba ste //
translated: Likewise, the dedication of others

original: bsod nams cher 'byung bdag nyid do //üîΩzhes pa ste /
analyzed: bsod nams cher 'byung bdag nyid do //üîΩzhes pa ste /
translated: is the nature of the great arising of merit.

original: sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams pas 'di khyad par du 'phags pas na khyad par can te /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams pas 'di khyad par du 'phags pas na khyad par can te /
translated: It is special because it is superior to the merit of all sentient beings that arises from giving, morality, and meditation.

original: de yang 'dir sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed de /
analyzed: de yang 'dir sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed de /
translated: Moreover, here it is dedicated to unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment, having been made common to all sentient beings.

original: de yang mi dmigs pa'i sbyor ba'i sa zhes pa yum chen mo las bshad de /
analyzed: de yang mi dmigs pa'i sbyor ba'i sa zhes pa yum chen mo las bshad de /
translated: Moreover, it is explained in the Great Mother that it is the stage of application without reference points.

original: khyad par des yongs su bsngo ba ni khyad par can gyis yongs su bsngo ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par des yongs su bsngo ba ni khyad par can gyis yongs su bsngo ba'o //
translated: The dedication with that special quality is the special dedication.

original: de @101b gsungs pa ni de nas yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de @101b gsungs pa ni de nas yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The statement of that is from ‚ÄúThen, again‚Äù and so forth.

original: dpa' 'am zhes pa ni byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i'o //
analyzed: dpa' 'am zhes pa ni byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHero‚Äù refers to those who have generated the enlightenment mind.

original: ji skad du bshad pas khyad par du gyur pa'i phyir sems dpa' chen po ste /
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pas khyad par du gyur pa'i phyir sems dpa' chen po ste /
translated: Because it is special in the way it has been explained, it is a great hero.

original: 'dir yongs su bsngo ba la dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes pas sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba ni dge ba la rjes su yi rang ba ste /
analyzed: 'dir yongs su bsngo ba la dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes pas sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba ni dge ba la rjes su yi rang ba ste /
translated: The virtue that arises from rejoicing in the great beings is rejoicing in virtue.

original: de yang 'dir thog mar mi dmigs pas yongs su bsngo ba rgya cher bshad de /
analyzed: de yang 'dir thog mar mi dmigs pas yongs su bsngo ba rgya cher bshad de /
translated: And here, the nonapprehending dedication is explained first, in detail.

original: de'i yongs su bsngo ba de dang lhan cig par gyur pa ni mchog ste /
analyzed: de'i yongs su bsngo ba de dang lhan cig par gyur pa ni mchog ste /
translated: That dedication together with it is supreme.

original: mchog la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: mchog la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is the cause of the supreme result,

original: de yang gang du go rims ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa nas sa bcu gcig gis bsdus pa ste /
analyzed: de yang gang du go rims ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa nas sa bcu gcig gis bsdus pa ste /
translated: and that is included in the eleven grounds, from the Joyous onward, in the proper order.

original: rang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the cause of the perfection of one's own and others' goals.

original: mi mnyam pa ni sangs rgyas rnams dang ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa ni sangs rgyas rnams dang ste /
translated: The unequalled is that of the buddhas.

original: de rnams thun mong ma yin zhing khyad par can no //
analyzed: de rnams thun mong ma yin zhing khyad par can no //
translated: It is not shared in common and is special.

original: phyis mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa ni kun tu 'od kyi dang / chos kyi sprin dag ji ltar mnyam ste /
analyzed: phyis mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa ni kun tu 'od kyi dang / chos kyi sprin dag ji ltar mnyam ste /
translated: The equal and unequal later is that of the Illuminating and Cloud of Dharma.

original: mi mnyam par chos mthun pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi mnyam par chos mthun pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the similarity of the Dharma with the unequalled.

original: sa bcu'i dbang phyug gi byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas nyid du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: sa bcu'i dbang phyug gi byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas nyid du blta bar bya'o //
translated: The Bodhisattva, lord of the ten stages, should be seen as the Buddha.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni ma yin no zhes rab tu gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni ma yin no zhes rab tu gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But not as the Perfectly Enlightened One.

original: de ltar na mchog la sogs pa'i tshig rnams kyis ni khyad par du bsngo ba'i byed pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar na mchog la sogs pa'i tshig rnams kyis ni khyad par du bsngo ba'i byed pa gsungs so //
translated: Thus, by the words supreme, etc., the function of the dedication is stated.

original: de skad ces smras pa dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Then, the Blessed One, etc.

original: 'dir phyogs bcu zhes pa ni phyogs bcu'o //
analyzed: 'dir phyogs bcu zhes pa ni phyogs bcu'o //
translated: Here, the ten directions are the ten directions.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi mchog ni snod kyi 'jig rten te /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi mchog ni snod kyi 'jig rten te /
translated: The supreme realm of space is the world receptacle.

original: thams cad ni phyogs de rnams thams cad la thams cad du song ba ni des khyab pa ste lhug pas zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: thams cad ni phyogs de rnams thams cad la thams cad du song ba ni des khyab pa ste lhug pas zhes pa'i don to //
translated: All is in all of those directions, i.e., it pervades them, i.e., it is extensive.

original: gzhal du med pa la sogs pa rnams ni khyab pa'i phyogs rnams re re zhing mngon par 'brel ba'i don la'o //
analyzed: gzhal du med pa la sogs pa rnams ni khyab pa'i phyogs rnams re re zhing mngon par 'brel ba'i don la'o //
translated: The immeasurable, etc., are in the sense of being connected with each of the pervaded directions.

original: mtha' yas mu med pa ni mtha' yas pa'i yang mtha' yas pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: mtha' yas mu med pa ni mtha' yas pa'i yang mtha' yas pa rnams la'o //
translated: Infinite and boundless refers to the infinite of the infinite.

original: de la phyogs shin tu ring zhing rgyun mi 'chad pas gzhal du med pa rnams so //
analyzed: de la phyogs shin tu ring zhing rgyun mi 'chad pas gzhal du med pa rnams so //
translated: There, the infinite are those that are immeasurable due to their extremely distant and uninterrupted directions.

original: grangs kyis yongs su chad pa med pas grangs med pa'o //
analyzed: grangs kyis yongs su chad pa med pas grangs med pa'o //
translated: The boundless are those that are not completely divided by number.

original: phyogs su rgya dang dpangs la tshad med pas tshad med pa rnams so //
analyzed: phyogs su rgya dang dpangs la tshad med pas tshad med pa rnams so //
translated: The immeasurables are those that are immeasurable in terms of breadth and height in all directions.

original: re re zhing bsam par mi nus pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams so //üîΩde rnams rang nyid kyis bsam gyis mi khyab cing rang nyid kyis mthar @102a * //
analyzed: re re zhing bsam par mi nus pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams so // de rnams rang nyid kyis bsam gyis mi khyab cing rang nyid kyis mthar @102a * //
translated: The inconceivable are those that cannot be conceived individually.

original: son pa med pas mtha' yas pa ste /üîΩde bzhin du phyogs re re zhing mtha' yas pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po ste /
analyzed: son pa med pas mtha' yas pa ste / de bzhin du phyogs re re zhing mtha' yas pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po ste /
translated: Those are inconceivable and endless by themselves.üîΩThus, each of the directions is an infinite trichiliocosm.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyi phyogs re re zhing stong gsum gyi de'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams zhes par 'brel to //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyi phyogs re re zhing stong gsum gyi de'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams zhes par 'brel to //
translated: The tathagatas of each of the directions of the world systems are connected with the trichiliocosm.

original: 'di yang re re bzhin du stong gsum dang 'brel ba'i don gyis na khyab pa'o //
analyzed: 'di yang re re bzhin du stong gsum dang 'brel ba'i don gyis na khyab pa'o //
translated: Since each of these is related to a trichiliocosm, they are extensive.

original: 'o na stong gsum po gcig la de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nyid dam zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na stong gsum po gcig la de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nyid dam zhe na /
translated: Now, is there only one TathƒÅgata in one trichiliocosm?

original: gsungs pa ni 'das pa'i dus zhes pa ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa ni 'das pa'i dus zhes pa ste /
translated: The reply is: in the past,

original: de la dus gcig tu /
analyzed: de la dus gcig tu /
translated: at one time,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig ste /
translated: there was one TathƒÅgata,

original: thams cad du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: thams cad du ni ma yin no //
translated: but not everywhere.

original: 'das pa'i yang dus med de /
analyzed: 'das pa'i yang dus med de /
translated: There is no past time,

original: thog ma med pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa'o //
analyzed: thog ma med pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa'o //
translated: because it is immeasurable due to being beginningless.

original: de'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi yang 'das pa'i dus kyi gzhal du med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
analyzed: de'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi yang 'das pa'i dus kyi gzhal du med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
translated: The immeasurable TathƒÅgatas of the past of that one world-system

original: dus yun ring por rgyun mchad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dus yun ring por rgyun mchad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: are for a long time, continuously.

original: de srid du de rnam grangs kyis yongs su mchod pa'i grangs med pa'o //
analyzed: de srid du de rnam grangs kyis yongs su mchod pa'i grangs med pa'o //
translated: For that long, they are the immeasurable offerings made by that one.

original: yid kyis chu dang rgyar yangs pas yongs su chod pa med pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyis chu dang rgyar yangs pas yongs su chod pa med pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa'o //
translated: Since they are immeasurable due to being vast and uninterrupted by the mind, they are immeasurable.

original: gcig cig bsams pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams so //
analyzed: gcig cig bsams pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams so //
translated: Since they are inconceivable due to being thought of as one, they are inconceivable.

original: gcig cig sems pa la mtha' yas par 'gyur bas mtha' yas pa rnams so //
analyzed: gcig cig sems pa la mtha' yas par 'gyur bas mtha' yas pa rnams so //
translated: Since one is infinite in the mind of one, they are infinite.

original: nyon mongs pa'i dgra bcom pas dgra bcom pa rnams so //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i dgra bcom pas dgra bcom pa rnams so //
translated: They are arhats because they are conquerors of the enemy of the afflictions.

original: phyin ci ma log par chos thams cad shes pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so //
analyzed: phyin ci ma log par chos thams cad shes pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so //
translated: They are perfectly enlightened buddhas because they know all phenomena without error.

original: srid pa'i lam gyi phyir lam ste ngar 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa'i lam gyi phyir lam ste ngar 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The path is the path of existence, that is, the apprehension of ‚ÄúI.‚Äù

original: 'jug pa ni srid pa dang srid pa'i gnas kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jug pa ni srid pa dang srid pa'i gnas kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is engagement because it engages existence and the abodes of existence.

original: spros pa ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa la sogs pa'i brtags pa la srid pa ni 'khor ba'o //
analyzed: spros pa ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa la sogs pa'i brtags pa la srid pa ni 'khor ba'o //
translated: Elaboration is the imputation of things and nonthings, and so on. Existence is samsara.

original: de dag tu 'dren pa ni 'dren pa ste /
analyzed: de dag tu 'dren pa ni 'dren pa ste /
translated: They are guides because they lead to those.

original: go rims bzhin du chos su lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba ste de dag zad pas ni chad pa'o //
analyzed: go rims bzhin du chos su lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba ste de dag zad pas ni chad pa'o //
translated: In order, they are the view of the transitory collection and the view of the person.

original: 'ching zhes pa ni yang srid pa med pa ste /
analyzed: 'ching zhes pa ni yang srid pa med pa ste /
translated: They are unfettered because they have exhausted those.

original: yang 'ching ba'i mya ngan med pas 'ching ba med pa ste /
analyzed: yang 'ching ba'i mya ngan med pas 'ching ba med pa ste /
translated: They are unfettered because they are free from the sorrow of bondage.

original: des 'ching ba yongs su zad pa'o //
analyzed: des 'ching ba yongs su zad pa'o //
translated: They are the complete exhaustion of bondage.

original: tsher ma dang 'dra bas tsher ma ste /
analyzed: tsher ma dang 'dra bas tsher ma ste /
translated: The thorns are like thorns.

original: lta ba ngan pa la de rnams dkrugs pas na tsher ma bcom ba'o //
analyzed: lta ba ngan pa la de rnams dkrugs pas na tsher ma bcom ba'o //
translated: The destruction of the thorns is the destruction of the bad views.

original: lhag ma ni gleng gzhi'i nang du bshad zin to //
analyzed: lhag ma ni gleng gzhi'i nang du bshad zin to //
translated: The rest has been explained in the nidana.

original: sems dang po bskyed pa ni sa lta bu ste /
analyzed: sems dang po bskyed pa ni sa lta bu ste /
translated: The first production of the thought of enlightenment is like the earth,

original: de nas brtsams nas zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab rnams go @102b rims ji lta ba bzhin du tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang /
analyzed: de nas brtsams nas zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab rnams go @102b rims ji lta ba bzhin du tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang /
translated: because the aggregates of morality, concentration, and wisdom, in that order, are like the elements of water, fire, and wind, respectively,

original: sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mngon sum du byed pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'o //
analyzed: sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mngon sum du byed pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'o //
translated: and the aggregate of liberation is like the sky, and the aggregate of the vision of the wisdom of liberation is like the mountain peak.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni stobs la sogs pa yod kyang de pha rol tu son pa ma yin pas de rnam par gcad pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes gzung ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni stobs la sogs pa yod kyang de pha rol tu son pa ma yin pas de rnam par gcad pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes gzung ngo //
translated: Although the bodhisattvas have the powers, etc., they are not yet perfections, because they have not yet reached the other shore.üîΩComplete knowledge is the uncontaminated path.

original: yongs su shes pa ni zag pa med pa'i lam yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid ni bde ba ste /
analyzed: yongs su shes pa ni zag pa med pa'i lam yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid ni bde ba ste /
translated: Perfect buddhahood is bliss,

original: nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the bliss of complete peace.

original: chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed pa ni rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa'i bya ba la /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed pa ni rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa'i bya ba la /
translated: Sovereignty over all things is the performance of miracles,

original: sgrib pa med pa ni dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrib pa med pa ni dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the absence of obscuration.

original: chags pa med pa ni ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chags pa med pa ni ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is unattached, because it is independent.

original: thogs pa med pa ni thams cad du rnam pa thams cad kyi shes bya la rab tu 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: thogs pa med pa ni thams cad du rnam pa thams cad kyi shes bya la rab tu 'jug pa'o //
translated: It is unimpeded, because it penetrates all objects of knowledge in every way.

original: dpe med pa ni des rjes su dpag pa la khyad par can gyi dpe med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dpe med pa ni des rjes su dpag pa la khyad par can gyi dpe med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is incomparable, because there is no other example that is superior to it.

original: yongs su ma bcad pas na dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su ma bcad pas na dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: It is immeasurable, because it is not fully apprehended.

original: khyad par ma lus pa gzhan dang bral ba'i ngo bo 'dzin pa ni mngon sum la /
analyzed: khyad par ma lus pa gzhan dang bral ba'i ngo bo 'dzin pa ni mngon sum la /
translated: The essence of the Buddha is the direct intuition of the non-differentiation of the individual and universal characteristics of all things.

original: des de la yongs su gzhal du med pa'o //
analyzed: des de la yongs su gzhal du med pa'o //
translated: It is immeasurable because it is not measured by that.

original: yang dag pa'i shes pa kho na stobs te /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i shes pa kho na stobs te /
translated: The power is the correct intuition alone,

original: thams cad zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it overwhelms everything.

original: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi stobs ni nus pa tshad med pas rgyun ma chad pa rnam pa thams cad du 'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba la'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi stobs ni nus pa tshad med pas rgyun ma chad pa rnam pa thams cad du 'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba la'o //
translated: The power of the Buddha's intuition is uninterrupted and extends everywhere in regard to the performance of benefit for beings, because it is immeasurable.

original: stobs rnams kyi nang na gang zhig sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes dang gzigs pa ste /
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi nang na gang zhig sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes dang gzigs pa ste /
translated: Among the powers, the power of the knowledge of the bases of efficacy is the knowledge and vision of the Buddhas.

original: thos pa mngon sum du byas pas so //
analyzed: thos pa mngon sum du byas pas so //
translated: It is the direct intuition of the teachings that have been heard.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhis legs par gang ba ni rtogs pa'i chos rnams thams cad kyis so //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhis legs par gang ba ni rtogs pa'i chos rnams thams cad kyis so //
translated: It is filled with the four forms of fearlessness, because of all the teachings that are to be realized.

original: don dam par ni yang dag pa'i ye shes rdzogs par byed pas so //
analyzed: don dam par ni yang dag pa'i ye shes rdzogs par byed pas so //
translated: It is the ultimate, because it is the completion of correct intuition.

original: lan gsum du bzlas shing rnam pa bcu gnyis dang ldan pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi chos te /
analyzed: lan gsum du bzlas shing rnam pa bcu gnyis dang ldan pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi chos te /
translated: It is the Dharma that is supramundane, because it is the three times seven repetitions of the twelve aspects.

original: de nyid 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: de nyid 'khor lo ste /
translated: That is the wheel,

original: lha dang mi rnams la 'khor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lha dang mi rnams la 'khor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it revolves for gods and humans.

original: de'i bskor ba ni phyogs bcur ro //
analyzed: de'i bskor ba ni phyogs bcur ro //
translated: Its revolution is in the ten directions.

original: 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa ni yan lag dgu rnams kyis te /
analyzed: 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa ni yan lag dgu rnams kyis te /
translated: Its extensive explanation is by way of the nine limbs.

original: de'i chos kyi gsal byed kyi ngag ni chos kyi sgron ma'o //
analyzed: de'i chos kyi gsal byed kyi ngag ni chos kyi sgron ma'o //
translated: The speech that illuminates the Dharma is the Dharma lamp.

original: de rnams 'dzin pa ni yid la rnam par gzhag pa la de gnyis kyi ngag ni chos kyi rnga'o //
analyzed: de rnams 'dzin pa ni yid la rnam par gzhag pa la de gnyis kyi ngag ni chos kyi rnga'o //
translated: The retention of those is the mental placement. The speech of those two is the Dharma drum.

original: de rnams yang dag par brdung ba ni gdul bya'i skye bos @103a * //üîΩthos par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams yang dag par brdung ba ni gdul bya'i skye bos @103a * // thos par byed pa'o //
translated: The correct beating of those is the hearing by the beings to be tamed.üîΩThat very speech is the Dharma conch. The beings to be tamed are the blowing.

original: de nyid kyi ngag ni chos kyi dung la de gdul bya rnams kyis zhes pa ni rab tu 'bud pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi ngag ni chos kyi dung la de gdul bya rnams kyis zhes pa ni rab tu 'bud pa'o //
translated: The proclamation of that Dharma conch is the observation of that very thing.üîΩThe completion of that by way of the mental attentions and cultivations that strive for that is the Dharma victory banner.üîΩThe speech that proclaims the Dharma is the Dharma banner. The beings to be tamed are the raising.

original: chos kyi dung de'i rab tu brjod pa de nyid la dmigs nas /
analyzed: chos kyi dung de'i rab tu brjod pa de nyid la dmigs nas /
translated: The proclamation of that Dharma banner is the observation of that very thing.

original: de don du gnyer ba'i rnam pa yid la byed pa'i sems pa dang bsgom pa dag gis yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: de don du gnyer ba'i rnam pa yid la byed pa'i sems pa dang bsgom pa dag gis yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The completion of that by way of the mental attentions and cultivations that strive for that is the Dharma victory banner.

original: bsgoms pa'i stobs las skyes pa de nyid kyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi chos kyi ral gris 'debs pa ste /
analyzed: bsgoms pa'i stobs las skyes pa de nyid kyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi chos kyi ral gris 'debs pa ste /
translated: By that very wisdom born of the power of meditation, he strikes with the sword of wisdom of supramundane wisdom.

original: nyon mongs pa rnams rnam par 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa rnams rnam par 'joms pa'o //
translated: He conquers the afflictions.

original: de nyid kyis yang skye bo mang po la rab tu 'jug pa'i chos kyi char des rab tu 'bebs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis yang skye bo mang po la rab tu 'jug pa'i chos kyi char des rab tu 'bebs pa'o //
translated: By that very wisdom, he rains down the rain of Dharma that enters many beings.

original: de nyid sgo glegs med pa'i mchod sbyin gyi phyir mchod sbyin no //
analyzed: de nyid sgo glegs med pa'i mchod sbyin gyi phyir mchod sbyin no //
translated: That very wisdom is a sacrifice because it is a sacrifice without a gate.

original: chos de'i sbyin pas sems can rnams thams cad tshim par byed pa ni yang dag par 'dzud cing yongs su stobs pa'o //
analyzed: chos de'i sbyin pas sems can rnams thams cad tshim par byed pa ni yang dag par 'dzud cing yongs su stobs pa'o //
translated: The gift of that Dharma satisfies all beings, and he engages them and strengthens them.

original: btul ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang dben pa rnams las rab tu gzhug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: btul ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang dben pa rnams las rab tu gzhug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He tames them by engaging them in the applications of mindfulness and the liberations.

original: bslabs pa ni /üîΩyang dag par spong ba rnams dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis la /
analyzed: bslabs pa ni / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis la /
translated: He trains themüîΩin the right efforts and the bases of supernatural power.

original: mos pa ni dbang po dang stobs rnams kyi mtha' gcig tu nges pa'o //
analyzed: mos pa ni dbang po dang stobs rnams kyi mtha' gcig tu nges pa'o //
translated: He inspires them with the faculties and the powers.

original: nges pa ni mya ngan las 'das par ro //
analyzed: nges pa ni mya ngan las 'das par ro //
translated: Certainty is in nirvana.

original: yid kyis bsgom pa ni nges par byed pa la /
analyzed: yid kyis bsgom pa ni nges par byed pa la /
translated: Mental cultivation is in the certainty.

original: des ni phan pa ste dang bar bya zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: des ni phan pa ste dang bar bya zhes pa'i don to //
translated: By that, one is benefited, that is, one becomes clear.

original: ma lus par gcig tu bsdus pa ni rjes su yi rang ba ma lus pa zhes pa dang 'brel to //
analyzed: ma lus par gcig tu bsdus pa ni rjes su yi rang ba ma lus pa zhes pa dang 'brel to //
translated: The complete collection is connected with the complete rejoicing.

original: gcig tu ni phung po gcig tu'o //
analyzed: gcig tu ni phung po gcig tu'o //
translated: Complete is in one heap.

original: gcig tu mngon par bsdus pa zhes pa'i rnam par 'grel pa ni sdom zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gcig tu mngon par bsdus pa zhes pa'i rnam par 'grel pa ni sdom zhes pa'o //
translated: The commentary on the complete collection is the summary.

original: gzhal ba ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i yid kyis rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhal ba ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i yid kyis rtogs pa'o //
translated: The measure is the realization by the mind in equipoise.

original: mchog ni rab tu 'phags pa'o //
analyzed: mchog ni rab tu 'phags pa'o //
translated: Supreme is the highest.

original: ji ltar na tshig bcu gcig ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar na tshig bcu gcig ce na /
translated: How are there eleven words?

original: dmigs pa bcu gcig la /
analyzed: dmigs pa bcu gcig la /
translated: In the eleven focal objects.

original: de rnams ni rab kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams ni rab kyi phyir ro //
translated: Those are for the best.

original: de gang du na dbus dang phyogs bcu la yang de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de la dmigs pa'i phyir de rnams la'o //
analyzed: de gang du na dbus dang phyogs bcu la yang de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de la dmigs pa'i phyir de rnams la'o //
translated: Where are they? In the middle and ten directions, those are in the roots of virtue that are offered to those Tathagatas together with their retinues, because they focus on them.

original: de la zhes pa la sogs pas rab 'byor gyis 'dri ba ste /
analyzed: de la zhes pa la sogs pas rab 'byor gyis 'dri ba ste /
translated: Subh≈´ti asks about this, beginning with ‚Äúin regard to those things‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: dngos po gang dag ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams la /
analyzed: dngos po gang dag ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams la /
translated: What are the things? They are the tathƒÅgatas, etc. of the ten directions.

original: dmigs pa gang dag ni de nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag go //
analyzed: dmigs pa gang dag ni de nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag go //
translated: What are the objects? They are the roots of virtue of just those.üîΩWhat are the aspects? They are the aggregates of morality and meditative stabilization, etc.

original: rnam pa gang dag ni tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po la sogs pa rnams @103b kyi de'i sems rjes su yi rang ba'i sems kyi nye bar dmigs par byed pa de dmigs par 'gyur ram mo //
analyzed: rnam pa gang dag ni tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po la sogs pa rnams @103b kyi de'i sems rjes su yi rang ba'i sems kyi nye bar dmigs par byed pa de dmigs par 'gyur ram mo //
translated: The mental activity of rejoicing in that is the mental observation of that.

original: mtshan mar byed pa ni rnam par rtog par byed pa ste /
analyzed: mtshan mar byed pa ni rnam par rtog par byed pa ste /
translated: The mental activity of taking a sign is the mental activity of conceptualizing.

original: gzhan du na ni rjes su yi rang ba dang yongs su bsngo bar mi sbyor ba'i phyir ro //üîΩ'du shes phyin ci log pa ni yod pa ma yin pa la mtshan mar yod pa nyid du gzung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na ni rjes su yi rang ba dang yongs su bsngo bar mi sbyor ba'i phyir ro // 'du shes phyin ci log pa ni yod pa ma yin pa la mtshan mar yod pa nyid du gzung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, one would not be engaged in rejoicing and dedicating.üîΩThe perversion of ideation is the apprehension of what does not exist as having a sign, as existing.

original: sems phyin ci log pa ni yod pa ma yin pa la dmigs pas gzung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems phyin ci log pa ni yod pa ma yin pa la dmigs pas gzung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The perversion of mind is the apprehension of what does not exist as an object.

original: lta ba phyin ci log pa ni yod pa dang bdag tu phyin ci log pa'i yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yul la kun tu 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lta ba phyin ci log pa ni yod pa dang bdag tu phyin ci log pa'i yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yul la kun tu 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The wrong view is the engagement with the unreal object of the self and existence.

original: 'di rnams bsgrub pa'i phyir 'dod chags kyi dpe ste /
analyzed: 'di rnams bsgrub pa'i phyir 'dod chags kyi dpe ste /
translated: These are established by the example of desire.

original: rnam par brtags pa ni sgo btags pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par brtags pa ni sgo btags pa'o //
translated: The imagined is the door of imputation.

original: kun tu brtags pa ni rgyud la yang nas yang du dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: kun tu brtags pa ni rgyud la yang nas yang du dmigs pa'o //
translated: The thoroughly imagined is the repeated observation in the continuum.

original: de ltar sems pa ni yongs su bsngo ba'i sems la /
analyzed: de ltar sems pa ni yongs su bsngo ba'i sems la /
translated: Thus, the mind is the mind of dedication.

original: chos thams cad ces pa ni 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad ces pa ni 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
translated: All phenomena is the extensive explanation of this.

original: khams thams cad ces pa ni dngos po la sogs pa rnams kyi rjes su yi rang ba'i sems dang 'brel ba rnams kyis so //
analyzed: khams thams cad ces pa ni dngos po la sogs pa rnams kyi rjes su yi rang ba'i sems dang 'brel ba rnams kyis so //
translated: All constituents are those associated with the mind of rejoicing in things and so forth.

original: sems ni yongs su bsngo ba'i sems la de yang ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems ni yongs su bsngo ba'i sems la de yang ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The mind is the mind of dedication, and that is also essenceless.

original: gang du zhes pa ni gang du yongs su bsngo ba nyid du mi 'gyur zhes par dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: gang du zhes pa ni gang du yongs su bsngo ba nyid du mi 'gyur zhes par dgongs pa'o //
translated: Where is the dedication not to be?

original: 'gyur zhes pa ni rjes su yi rang ba dang yongs su bsngo bas sogs par 'gyur ba dag gi tsam gzung bas ni rjes su gnas pa rnam par gcod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gyur zhes pa ni rjes su yi rang ba dang yongs su bsngo bas sogs par 'gyur ba dag gi tsam gzung bas ni rjes su gnas pa rnam par gcod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word will refers to the completion of the rejoicing and the dedication by the word only. The word only excludes the subsequent state.

original: dad pa ni yid ches pa'o //
analyzed: dad pa ni yid ches pa'o //
translated: Faith is confidence.

original: dga' ba ni mos pa'o //
analyzed: dga' ba ni mos pa'o //
translated: Joy is interest.

original: dang ba ni yid rnyog pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: dang ba ni yid rnyog pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: Clarity is the mind free from turbidity.

original: gus pa ni 'dud pa'o //üîΩnye bar brtan pa ni brtan par byas pa'o //
analyzed: gus pa ni 'dud pa'o // nye bar brtan pa ni brtan par byas pa'o //
translated: Respect is bowing.üîΩFirmness is stability.

original: 'gong ba ni zhum pa'o //
analyzed: 'gong ba ni zhum pa'o //
translated: Depression is discouragement.

original: kun tu zhum pa ni the tshom gyis so //
analyzed: kun tu zhum pa ni the tshom gyis so //
translated: Complete discouragement is due to doubt.

original: bag tsha ba ni dub pa'o //
analyzed: bag tsha ba ni dub pa'o //
translated: Fear is anxiety.

original: 'khums par gyur pa ni dub par gyur pas so //üîΩskrag par rtsom pa ni skrag pa'o //
analyzed: 'khums par gyur pa ni dub par gyur pas so // skrag par rtsom pa ni skrag pa'o //
translated: Depression is the state of being depressed.üîΩThe beginning of fear is fearfulness.

original: tshogs pa'i skrag pa ni kun tu skrag pa'o //
analyzed: tshogs pa'i skrag pa ni kun tu skrag pa'o //
translated: The fear of the assembly is terror.

original: de'i rgyun ni kun tu skrag pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyun ni kun tu skrag pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Its continuity is the state of being terrified.

original: de ltar zhes pa ni 'gong ba la sogs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes pa ni 'gong ba la sogs pa med pa'o //
translated: The word thus refers to the absence of depression and so on.

original: gal te zhes pa ni rjes su yi rang ba po'i sems la zad ces pa ni bstan pa'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes pa ni rjes su yi rang ba po'i sems la zad ces pa ni bstan pa'o //
translated: If refers to the mind of the one who rejoices. Will be exhausted is the teaching.

original: lhag ma ni bshad pa ste /
analyzed: lhag ma ni bshad pa ste /
translated: The rest is self-evident.

original: 'gags pa ni rnam par zhig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gags pa ni rnam par zhig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Ceased means destroyed.

original: bral ba ni mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bral ba ni mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Separated means not remaining.

original: rnam par gyur pa ni yang mi skye ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par gyur pa ni yang mi skye ba'o //
translated: Transformed means not arising again.

original: gang zhes pa ni de ni ci yang min te /
analyzed: gang zhes pa ni de ni ci yang min te /
translated: Whatever means that is nothing at all.

original: ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it has no intrinsic reality.

original: phrad pa med pa ni dus mnyam du'o //üîΩsems kyi chos nyid @104a * //
analyzed: phrad pa med pa ni dus mnyam du'o // sems kyi chos nyid @104a * //
translated: Not meeting means at the same time.

original: rtag pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: rtag pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: The reality of mind is not permanent.

original: gsungs pa / mi nus zhes te /
analyzed: gsungs pa / mi nus zhes te /
translated: It is said: ‚ÄúIt cannot be.

original: de rnams don dam par ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'dus ma byas pa nyid pas yongs su bsngo ba la sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams don dam par ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'dus ma byas pa nyid pas yongs su bsngo ba la sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are ultimately uncompounded, having the characteristic of intrinsic realitylessness, they are not applied to the transformation.

original: legs par yongs su gzung ba ni tshig ma legs pa ma yin par gzung ba la ni legs par yongs su bsngo ba nyid la sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: legs par yongs su gzung ba ni tshig ma legs pa ma yin par gzung ba la ni legs par yongs su bsngo ba nyid la sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Well-grasped means not grasped with incorrect words. Because it is not well-transformed, it is not applied.

original: brtsams pa ni dbang du byas pa'o //
analyzed: brtsams pa ni dbang du byas pa'o //
translated: Commenced means taken up.

original: gzhir byas pa ni 'dri ba'i gnas skabs su'o //
analyzed: gzhir byas pa ni 'dri ba'i gnas skabs su'o //
translated: The basis is in the state of being asked.

original: 'phags pa byams pas lan gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: 'phags pa byams pas lan gsungs pa ni /
translated: The noble Maitreya's reply is:

original: gal te zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gal te zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: If, etc.

original: 'di ni gnyi ga 'di'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gnyi ga 'di'o //
translated: This is both of them.

original: de ltar zhes pa la ni legs par gzung ba'i phyir la /
analyzed: de ltar zhes pa la ni legs par gzung ba'i phyir la /
translated: Thus is for the sake of good retention.

original: yongs su bsngo ba ni legs su bsngo ba'o //
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ba ni legs su bsngo ba'o //
translated: Dedication is good dedication.

original: 'di ltar yang dag par shes zhes pa ni bstan pa la /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang dag par shes zhes pa ni bstan pa la /
translated: Thus, with right knowledge is the teaching.

original: 'di ltar sems zhes pa bshad pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems zhes pa bshad pa ste /
translated: Thus, with mind is the explanation.

original: phyin ci ma log pas yid la bya zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: phyin ci ma log pas yid la bya zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: One should attend with non-error.

original: zad pa ni 'das pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: zad pa ni 'das pa'i phyir la /
translated: Extinguished is because of pastness.

original: zad pa zhes pa la sogs pa rnams kyis ni rnam grangs kyis yid la byed pa'o //
analyzed: zad pa zhes pa la sogs pa rnams kyis ni rnam grangs kyis yid la byed pa'o //
translated: Extinguished and so on are mental attentions by way of synonyms.

original: mi nus pa ni med pa'i phyir ri bong gi rva bzhin no //
analyzed: mi nus pa ni med pa'i phyir ri bong gi rva bzhin no //
translated: Impossible is because of non-existence, like the horn of a rabbit.

original: de'i chos nyid ces pa ni ngo bo nyid med pa nyid la /
analyzed: de'i chos nyid ces pa ni ngo bo nyid med pa nyid la /
translated: Its reality is the very unreality.

original: chos zhes pa ni sems las byung ba rnams kyis so //
analyzed: chos zhes pa ni sems las byung ba rnams kyis so //
translated: Dharma is by way of mental factors.

original: dad pa ni sems la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: dad pa ni sems la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
translated: Faith is by way of mind and so on.

original: chos rnams la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la'o //
analyzed: chos rnams la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la'o //
translated: Dharmas are the Buddha's dharmas.

original: gal te zhes pa la sogs pa ni nye bar bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes pa la sogs pa ni nye bar bsdu ba'o //
translated: The summary is stated by ‚Äúif‚Äù and so forth.

original: 'di ltar zhes pa ni dmigs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes pa ni dmigs pa med pa ste /
translated: ‚Äú In this way‚Äù is the absence of an objective support.

original: thams cad du stong pa nyid dang ro gcig par yid la byed pas zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: thams cad du stong pa nyid dang ro gcig par yid la byed pas zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should attend to everything as being of one taste with emptiness.

original: 'dir 'di ni 'phags pa byams pas 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbang du byas nas gsungs la /
analyzed: 'dir 'di ni 'phags pa byams pas 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbang du byas nas gsungs la /
translated: Here, this is stated by the noble Maitreya from the perspective of the buddhas of the past.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa ni /
translated: From the perspective of the buddhas of the future, he says:

original: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
