analyzed: de la thams cad shes pa'i rnam pa ni nyi shu rtsa bdun te /
translated: The aspect of knowing all is twenty-seven.

original: 'dir bstan bcos las /üîΩmed pa'i rnam pa nas bzung ste //
analyzed: 'dir bstan bcos las / med pa'i rnam pa nas bzung ste //
translated: Here in the treatise,üîΩFrom the aspect of nonexistence

original: mi g-yo ba yi rnam pa'i bar //
analyzed: mi g-yo ba yi rnam pa'i bar //
translated: Up to the aspect of nonfluctuation,

original: bden pa so so la bzhi dang // lam la de ni bco lngar bshad //
analyzed: bden pa so so la bzhi dang // lam la de ni bco lngar bshad //
translated: Four for each truth and fifteen for the path are explained.

original: ces te / de la sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la bzhi ste /
analyzed: ces te / de la sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la bzhi ste /
translated: The truth of suffering has four aspects:

original: med pa dang mnyam pa nyid dang dben pa nyid dang mi brdzi ba ni de'i rnam pa'i phyir de'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do //
analyzed: med pa dang mnyam pa nyid dang dben pa nyid dang mi brdzi ba ni de'i rnam pa'i phyir de'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do //
translated: nonexistence, sameness, isolation, and nondisturbance.

original: nam mkha' ni med pa nyid la /
analyzed: nam mkha' ni med pa nyid la /
translated: Space is nonexistence.

original: nam mkha' bzhin du gzugs pa sogs pa yang med pa nyid do //
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin du gzugs pa sogs pa yang med pa nyid do //
translated: Form, etc. are also nonexistence, like space.

original: chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid ni bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dag mnyam pa nyid de /
analyzed: chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid ni bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dag mnyam pa nyid de /
translated: The nonapprehension of all things is the sameness of pleasure and pain.

original: gzhung kha cig tu ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyid ces te /
analyzed: gzhung kha cig tu ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyid ces te /
translated: In some texts, it is called the sameness of the dissimilar.

original: mi mnyam pa ni sdug bsngal la /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa ni sdug bsngal la /
translated: The dissimilar is pain.

original: de yis mnyam zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de yis mnyam zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is the same as that.

original: shin tu stong pa nyid ni gang zag dang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: shin tu stong pa nyid ni gang zag dang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid do //
translated: Extreme emptiness is the emptiness of the person and of things.

original: gnod pa po sdug bsngal gyis gnod par bya ba'i phyir na brjod pa ni bdag la /
analyzed: gnod pa po sdug bsngal gyis gnod par bya ba'i phyir na brjod pa ni bdag la /
translated: Because the one who is harmed by suffering is the self, it is said that the self is not disturbed by suffering.

original: brdzi ba med pa ni bdag med pa ste /
analyzed: brdzi ba med pa ni bdag med pa ste /
translated: Nondisturbance is selflessness.üîΩThe truth of origination has four aspects:üîΩcause, origination, strong production, and condition.

original: de'i rnam pa'i phyir ni mi brdzi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid de /
analyzed: de'i rnam pa'i phyir ni mi brdzi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid de /
translated: The perfection of invincibility is due to its aspect,

original: chos rnams thams cad la gnod bya dang gnod byed mi dmigs pa nyid kyis dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad la gnod bya dang gnod byed mi dmigs pa nyid kyis dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is unobservable, since the harm and the one who is harmed are not observed in any phenomenon.

original: kun 'byung ba'i la bzhi ste /
analyzed: kun 'byung ba'i la bzhi ste /
translated: There are four with regard to the origin of suffering:

original: de ltar yang gnas ni rgyu ste /
analyzed: de ltar yang gnas ni rgyu ste /
translated: The basis is the cause,

original: tha mal pa'i phung po rnams so //
analyzed: tha mal pa'i phung po rnams so //
translated: the ordinary aggregates.

original: ngo bo nyid ni bdag nyid kyi dngos po ste /üîΩlus kyi las dang / brjod pa ngag gi las dang / ming ni yid kyis te las dang nyon mongs pa la 'di rnams med pas go rims bzhin du gnas med pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa dang / brjod @126a * //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid ni bdag nyid kyi dngos po ste / lus kyi las dang / brjod pa ngag gi las dang / ming ni yid kyis te las dang nyon mongs pa la 'di rnams med pas go rims bzhin du gnas med pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa dang / brjod @126a * //
translated: The essence is one's own entity,

original: du med pa dang / ming med pa ste /
analyzed: du med pa dang / ming med pa ste /
translated: the body is the action of the body, speech is the action of speech, and the name is the action of mind. Since these do not exist in karma and affliction, they are, respectively, baseless, essenceless, inexpressible, and nameless.

original: de'i rnam pa'i phyir na de'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa'i phyir na de'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of that is due to its aspect.

original: ming ni gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po la phung po la ni lus te gzugs kyi phung po'o //
analyzed: ming ni gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po la phung po la ni lus te gzugs kyi phung po'o //
translated: The name is the formless aggregates, and the body is the form aggregate.

original: de dag med pa ni ming med pa dang / lus med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de dag med pa ni ming med pa dang / lus med pa nyid do //
translated: Their non-existence is the absence of name and the absence of body.

original: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba ni lus kyi las te /
analyzed: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba ni lus kyi las te /
translated: Coming and going is bodily action.

original: de med pa ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa'o //
analyzed: de med pa ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa'o //
translated: Their non-existence is the absence of coming and going.

original: brjod pa'i rgyu ni rnam par rtog pa la de med pa ni rtog pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: brjod pa'i rgyu ni rnam par rtog pa la de med pa ni rtog pa med pa nyid do //
translated: The cause of expression is conceptualization. Their non-existence is the absence of conceptualization.

original: 'gog pa'i gzhi ni de ltar yang 'dir 'gro bar 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: 'gog pa'i gzhi ni de ltar yang 'dir 'gro bar 'gyur ba'am /
translated: The basis of cessation is that in this way, there is no coming or going,

original: gzung ba'am / zad pa'am /
analyzed: gzung ba'am / zad pa'am /
translated: no apprehension, no exhaustion,

original: skye ba rnams med pas go rims ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba ma mchis pa dang / mi 'phrogs pa dang / mi zad pa dang / mi skye ba ste /
analyzed: skye ba rnams med pas go rims ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba ma mchis pa dang / mi 'phrogs pa dang / mi zad pa dang / mi skye ba ste /
translated: and no arising. Therefore, in order, there is the absence of coming and going, the absence of appropriation, the absence of exhaustion, and the absence of arising.

original: de'i rnam pa'i phyir de'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa'i phyir de'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Because of their aspects, they are perfections.

original: chos thams cad 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / chos rnams thams cad la gzung du med pa nyid ni chos kyis chos la gzung du med de don dam par na med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / chos rnams thams cad la gzung du med pa nyid ni chos kyis chos la gzung du med de don dam par na med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The absence of coming and going of all phenomena and the absence of apprehension of all phenomena is that phenomena are not apprehended in phenomena because ultimately they do not exist.

original: zad pa nyid kyis chos des de la sbyor ba med pas mi zad pa'i chos dang ldan pa nyid do //
analyzed: zad pa nyid kyis chos des de la sbyor ba med pas mi zad pa'i chos dang ldan pa nyid do //
translated: Since it is exhausted, it is not associated with that dharma, and thus it is endowed with the dharma of non-exhaustion.

original: mngon par 'grub pa ni skye ba ste /
analyzed: mngon par 'grub pa ni skye ba ste /
translated: Realization is birth.

original: de la med pas mngon par ma grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: de la med pas mngon par ma grub pa nyid do //
translated: Since it does not exist there, it is non-realization.

original: lam la bco lnga ni byed pa po med pa dang shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa dang / mi 'pho ba dang / dul ba med pa dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / smig rgyu dang /
analyzed: lam la bco lnga ni byed pa po med pa dang shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa dang / mi 'pho ba dang / dul ba med pa dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / smig rgyu dang /
translated: The path has fifteen aspects: the absence of an agent, the absence of a knower, the absence of a seer, non-transmigration, non-taming, dream, echo, optical illusion, mirage,

original: sgyu ma dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / gos pa med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / rlom pa med pa dang / g-yo ba med pa rnams te /
analyzed: sgyu ma dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / gos pa med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / rlom pa med pa dang / g-yo ba med pa rnams te /
translated: illusion, absence of defilement, absence of purification, non-attachment, non-elaboration, and non-agitation.

original: byed pa po med pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i phyir na de'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byed pa po med pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i phyir na de'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Because of the aspects of the absence of an agent and so forth, it is the perfection of the other shore.

original: lam ni byed pa po med pa ste /
analyzed: lam ni byed pa po med pa ste /
translated: The path is without an agent.

original: de nas byed pa dmigs su med pa'o //
analyzed: de nas byed pa dmigs su med pa'o //
translated: The agent is not observed there.

original: lam la shes pa po dang mthong ba po med pa ste /
analyzed: lam la shes pa po dang mthong ba po med pa ste /
translated: The path is not a knower or a seer.

original: des na shes pa po dang / mthong ba po dmigs su med pa'o //
analyzed: des na shes pa po dang / mthong ba po dmigs su med pa'o //
translated: Therefore, a knower or a seer is not apprehended.

original: lam la kun tu 'pho ba med de des na 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba dag tu mi sbyor ba ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lam la kun tu 'pho ba med de des na 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba dag tu mi sbyor ba ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The path is not a transmigrator, because it does not connect death and rebirth.

original: lam la dul ba med pa ste /
analyzed: lam la dul ba med pa ste /
translated: The path is not a tamer.

original: des na dus gsum sgyu ma'i rang bzhin pas dul ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na dus gsum sgyu ma'i rang bzhin pas dul ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, it is not a tamer, because the three times have the nature of an illusion.

original: rmi lam la sogs pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir rmi lam la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rmi lam la sogs pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir rmi lam la sogs pa ste /
translated: A dream, etc., is like a dream, etc.

original: lam ni rmi lam ste /
analyzed: lam ni rmi lam ste /
translated: The path is a dream,

original: gdul bya lta ba po la 'dod pa'i don ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gdul bya lta ba po la 'dod pa'i don ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it shows the desired object to the viewer of the disciples.

original: lam ni brag ca ste /
analyzed: lam ni brag ca ste /
translated: The path is an echo,

original: yod @126b pa ma yin pa'i sgra la sgrar dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod @126b pa ma yin pa'i sgra la sgrar dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because a sound that does not exist is apprehended as a sound.

original: lam ni mig yor dang gzugs brnyan dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: lam ni mig yor dang gzugs brnyan dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: The path is like a mirage,

original: gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the reflection of a form is apprehended.

original: lam ni smig rgyu ste /
analyzed: lam ni smig rgyu ste /
translated: The path is a mirage,üîΩbecause it is a reflection of the form of the world.

original: de ni chu'i phung po bzhin du med bzhin 'jig rten khams su snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni chu'i phung po bzhin du med bzhin 'jig rten khams su snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is like a mass of water, appearing in the world without existing.

original: lam sgyu ma ste /
analyzed: lam sgyu ma ste /
translated: The path is an illusion,

original: rang gi rang bzhin gyis mi snang ba'i phyir de ma skyes par shes pa nyid ces pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi rang bzhin gyis mi snang ba'i phyir de ma skyes par shes pa nyid ces pa'o //
translated: because it does not appear by its own nature.üîΩIt is the non-production of the path,

original: gang du lnga po 'di rnams kyis kyang lam ma skyes pa gsal bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: gang du lnga po 'di rnams kyis kyang lam ma skyes pa gsal bar byed pa ste /
translated: because it is manifested by these five.

original: lam ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: lam ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ste /
translated: The path is uncontaminated,

original: des na 'dod chags la sogs pa dmigs su med pa'o //
analyzed: des na 'dod chags la sogs pa dmigs su med pa'o //
translated: because it does not apprehend desire, etc.

original: lam ni rnam par byang ba med pa ste /
analyzed: lam ni rnam par byang ba med pa ste /
translated: The path is unpurified,

original: des na sems can nyon mongs pa ci mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na sems can nyon mongs pa ci mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not apprehend sentient beings as afflicted.

original: lam ni nye bar gos pa med pas nam mkha' bzhin du nye bar gos pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings te /
analyzed: lam ni nye bar gos pa med pas nam mkha' bzhin du nye bar gos pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings te /
translated: The path is the unsoiled expanse of reality, like space, because it is unsoiled.

original: des na mthong ba med pa'i sbyor bas mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na mthong ba med pa'i sbyor bas mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the seeing of non-seeing, because it is the application of non-seeing.

original: lam ni spros pa med pa ste /
analyzed: lam ni spros pa med pa ste /
translated: The path is unembellished,

original: spros pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: spros pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: because it is the antidote to embellishment.

original: / lam ni rlom pa med pa ste /
analyzed: / lam ni rlom pa med pa ste /
translated: The path is non-conceited,üîΩbecause it is the antidote to conceit.

original: rlom pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rlom pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all pride is completely destroyed.

original: lam ni mi g-yo ba ste /
analyzed: lam ni mi g-yo ba ste /
translated: The path is unshakable,

original: chos dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis rtag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis rtag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is permanent by the nature of the dharma-element.

original: 'bras bu'i gnas skabs nyid kyis thams cad shes pa'i rnam pa ni nyan thos rnams kyi ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i gnas skabs nyid kyis thams cad shes pa'i rnam pa ni nyan thos rnams kyi ste /
translated: The aspect of all-knowledge is that of the stage of result for the disciples,
